{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 26\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 I tre nomi della luna}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Luna quanto al cielo et allora e dea di castita}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. Diana quanto ad i boschi et ad i diserti allora e detta dea de cacciatori. Proserpina quanto all\rquote onferno allora e dea dee\rquote ombra et de morti. Explicit\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung: {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs18\chcbpat17 Florenz, BML, Plut. 40.49, 129}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs18\chcbpat17 Florenz, BR, Ricc. 1093, 42}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 r/v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20.}
Luna quanto al cielo et allora e dea di castita

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 26\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -35\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Rede}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 des {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Nello di Giuliano Martini da San Gimigniano}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 vor {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Papst Martin V.}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24, gehalten auf dem Konsistorium am 25. Juli 1425 in Rom\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, mit Liste der anwesenden Kardin\u228 \'e4le \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (26\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Vorbemerkungen mit Liste der teilnehmenden Kardin\u228 \'e4le] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >Q<}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 uesta e la expositione ouero narratione della imbasciata fatta}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 ad Roma a di xxiiij\plain \f1\b\i\super\lang1033\fs24 o\plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 di luglio mcccc\plain \f1\b\i\super\lang1033\fs24 o\plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 xxo\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 al sonmo pontefice papa Martino quinto, impresentia del collegio de\lquote suoi cardinali nel secreto consistoro \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 per messer \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 Nello di Giuliano da Sangimignano\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, egregio dottore et ciptadino fiorentino, imbasciadore del magnifico et potente comune di Firen\u231 \'e7a, in cui compagnia erano messer \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 Rinaldo de Halbe\u231 \'e7\u231 \'e7i et Agnolo di Filippo di ser Giouanni\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [in marg.: \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 Pandolfini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 ]. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Nel quale consistoro\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 furono l\rquote infrascritti cardinali cioe\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 : \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Cardinale delli Orsini. Cardinale de\rquote Conti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Cardinale de\rquote Brancacci et Cardinale di Santo Eustati\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Dazwischen (teils marginal) Bemerkungen zum Tod Martins V. (vorheriger Name: Oddo de Colonna) und der Wahl {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Eugens IV}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (27\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -35\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Rede] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >N<}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Oi non siamo ignari, padre beatissimo, che nella cosa}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, la quale abbiamo a fare dauanti alla tua santita et del sacro conlegio de signori cardinali, sarebbe necessario con hornata et pulita oratione ad laudare et magnificare la magnificentia della sedia appostolica et della tua beatitudine\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et ad tutti uoi et ad ciascuno in particulare, con uero effetto, et a farne ogni pruoua, quella comunita et suo potere in tutte le cose alla uostra B\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [eatitudine]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et signoria grate, humilemente suplicando che la nostra lunghe\u231 \'e7\u231 \'e7a et mio innetto parlare abbiate con benignita soportato. Explicit\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Rede nach Florenz, BNC, Magliabec. 1385, abgedruckt in Cesare \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Guasti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Commissioni di Rinaldo degli Albizzi per il Comune di Firenze dal MCCCXCIX al MCCCCXXXIII, Bd. 2 [1424-1426], Florenz 1869, S. 534-540. Abweichungen im Text. Barbarossa}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Brief Saladins] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >A<}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 ltissimo messer Federigo per la diuina poten\u231 \'e7a re de Christiani}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, che adorano il crocifisso salute, se idio ama allegro donatore, adunque ama elli me. Pero che tutte le mie cose sono come amici, costrigni adunque i tuo (\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 !) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Christiani, che non faccino contro ad i miei sara\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [c]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ini, se non mi trouerrai mutato\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [Antwort Friedrichs I.] >{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 F<}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 ederigo per la gratia didio re de Romani et senpre acrescitore}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di Ierusalem et di Sicilia, al soldano di Babillonia: Rendi le terre riconperate del sangue di Na\u231 \'e7\u231 \'e7areth. Et se non lo farai, la sonma della nostra poten\u231 \'e7a si mostrerra sopra ad te\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine \u220 \'dcbersetzung der lateinischen\u8222 \'84Epistola Soldani\ldblquote , ediert in Wilhelm \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Wattenbach\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Fausse correspondance du Sultan avec Cl\u233 \'e9ment V., in: Archives de l\rquote Orient latin (2, 2) 1884, S. 299-303. Dieser Brief meist an einen Papst gerichtet, vgl. Bettina \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Wagner\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Sultansbriefe I 2, in: VL\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 2\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Bd. 11, coll. 1463-1464. Ebenfalls keine \u220 \'dcbereinstimmung mit dem lateinischen Brief Friedrichs I. an Saladin, abgedruckt in Benedict \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 of Peterborough\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Gesta regis Henrici Secundi Benedicti abbatis, William Stubbs (ed.), London 1867, S. 62-63.}

Febr. 1352)\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, italienische \u220 \'dcbersetzung \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Epistola di messer Francesco Petrarca fiorentino poeta, mandata al famosissimo huomo messer Niccola delli Acciaiuoli gransiniscalco del reame di Napoli. Sopra la coronatione del re Luigi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Tabula: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di Taranto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 ] \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 >N<}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 El ultimo, o huomo famosissimo, la fede a uinto la perfidia}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, la largita l\rquote auaritia, l\rquote umilta la superbia et nel ultimo, l\rquote odio a dato luogo alla carita\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Et di poi che qui del mondo sara partito, doue noi siamo, uelocissimo, sicondo che Tulio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (=Marcus Tullius Cicero) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 schriue, uolera alle sedie del cielo. Vale. Honore della patria et di noi. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Edition: Francesco \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Petrarca\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Epistola a messer Niccola Acciaiuoli, siniscalco del regno di Puglia per la coronazione del re Luigi, Giuseppe Ignazio \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Montanari\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Rom 1835; Delizie degli eruditi toscani, Bd. 13, Ildefonso \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 di San Luigi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Florenz 1780, S. 342-352. \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 44\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -45\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Kriegserkl\u228 \'e4rung}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 des {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Duca Gian Galeazzo Visconti}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 von Mailand an Bologna (Pavia, 1390) und Antwortbrief Bolognas \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (44\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -45\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Brief Viscontis] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Ad li egregi huomini antiani et consoli alla comunita di Bologna. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Dolemoci et abiamo conpassione, ciptadini egregij}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, che per li altrui de meriti contro alla nostra cipta, la quale sempre la chiara memoria del signore nostro genitore d\rquote una spetiale et cordiale dele\u231 \'e7ione\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 dobbiamo con arme contro ad uoi et lo stato uo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (45\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 stro parimente fare\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Noi et lo istato nostro dal di della presentatione di questa nostra lettera inan\u231 \'e7i, costretti piu che uolontarij disfidiamo. Data in Pauia. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (45\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Antwort Bolognas] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Risposta ad questa lettera che il conte di uirtu mando ad Bolognesi. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Noi abbiamo aspettato infino allora nouissima, huomo magnifico}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, l\rquote quale ti glorij nella malitia cosi come possente nella iniquita, di conoscere le uersutie della mente nostra\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di presente saranno stirpati insino alle radici, la tirannica prauita et di poi in lunghissima tranquilita si conuertira. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\ql\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Nicht ediert oder gedruckt. Eine lateinische Version der beiden Briefe in {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Mailand, Bibl. Ambr., H 211 inf., 4}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 -5}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Die auf das Jahr 1390 zu datierende Kriegserkl\u228 \'e4rung und der Antwortbrief wird u. a. erw\u228 \'e4hnt bei Pompeo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Vizani\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Diece libri delle historie della sua patria, Bologna 1596, S. 247 (schon von \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buchholz\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 352, angemerkt). Zu Gian Galeazzo Visconti (auch \u8222 \'84conte di Virt\u249 \'f9\ldblquote genannt) und den Umst\u228 \'e4nden dieses Kriegs vgl. Andrea \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Gamberini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, in: DBI (54) 2000, S. 383-391.}
Dolemoci et abiamo conpassione ciptadini egregi
Noi abbiamo aspettato infino allora novissima huomo magnifico

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red224\green224\blue224;\red204\green238\blue221;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 45\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -46\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Kriegserkl\u228 \'e4rung}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 des {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Duca Gian Galeazzo Visconti}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 von Mailand an Florenz (Pavia, 19. Apr. 1390) und Antwortbrief von Florenz \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (45\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -46\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Brief Viscontis] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Alla magnifica comunita di Firen\u231 \'e7e, la quale lettera fu loro mandata dal conte di Uirtu, quando li sfido in guerra\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 La pace di Ytalia per ogni studio da qui adietro con intentione}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 none stanca abbiamo domandato, et non abbiamo perdonato ne afaticha ne appesa. Abiauamo desiderio che lassata la lunga guerra di Ytalia \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 dal di della presentatione di questa nostra disfidan\u231 \'e7a inan\u231 \'e7i necessarij che uolontarij siano prouocati. Data in Pauia di xviiij\plain \f1\i\super\lang1033\fs24 o\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 aprile 1390\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (46\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -48\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Antwort von Florenz] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Risposta de\lquote fiorentini alla detta lettera \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (46\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Oggi riceuemo lettera di mano d\rquote uno corriere sotto nome di Giouanni Galea\u231 \'e7\u231 \'e7o Bisconte}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, il quale si dice conte di Uirtu etc. di Milano etc. imperiale uicaro et generale etc. Tutta piena di bugie et d\rquote inganni et cosi superbamente come infedelmente come ludente\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Vedra lui d\rquote una uolonta d\rquote animo disposti piu tosto heleggere di morire, che essere numerati tra i so\u231 \'e7\u231 \'e7i subditi. Data in Firen\u231 \'e7e di ii du maggio xiii inditione 1390. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Nicht ediert. Ein eher res\u252 \'fcmierender Abdruck beider Briefe in Leonardo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bruni\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, La historia universale de suoi tempi, Venedig 1560, 190\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 -191\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (lateinisch in Leonardo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bruni\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, History of the Florentine People, Bd. 3, James \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Hankins\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), London 2007, S. 100-104). Edition der lateinischen Briefe in Anonymus, Annales Mediolanenses ab anno MCCXXX usque ad annum MCCCCII, in: L. A. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Muratori\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), RIS, Bd. 16, Mailand 1730, coll. 815-817. Handschriften mit dem lateinischen Text u.a. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 Mailand, Bibl. Ambr., H 211 inf., 3}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 v}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 -4}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 v}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 }}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (mit anderer Jahreszahl); {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs18\chcbpat18 Modena, Bibl. Estense-Univ., Lat.2 = alfa.Q.9.16, 87}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[2].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 Wien \u214 \'d6NB, Ms. 3121, fol. 137ff}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. (vgl. Joseph \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Chmel\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Die Handschriften der k. k. Hofbibliothek in Wien, Bd. 2, Wien 1841, S. 14-15). \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 In Codex P 256 sup. der Ambrosiana (s. o.) wird als Verfasser des Briefs {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 Pasquino Cappelli}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 genannt, der in Diensten Gian Galeazzo Viscontis stand und als Humanist ein Freund {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 Petrarcas}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 war, vgl. online: http://www.cronachevenezianeravennati.it/codici/codice.jsp?ACTION=Carica&ID_CODICE=641 (letzter Zugriff: 24.08.2016). Zum Konflikt Gian Galeazzo Viscontis mit der Liga Florenz-Bologna-Perugia vgl. Andrea \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Barlucchi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, La guerra tra Firenze e Gian Galeazzo Visconti, in: \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\cf1 Coluccio Salutati e Firenze: ideologia e formazione dello Stato Firenze, \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 F. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20\cf1 Cardini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [Hrsg.], Florenz 2008, S. 137-149.}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset162 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red224\green224\blue224;\red204\green238\blue221;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 48\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -50\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 (Fiktiver) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Brief}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 des t\u252 \'fcrkischen {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Emirs Umur Bey}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 an {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Papst Clemens VI.}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 von 1345 (= {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 \u8222 \'84Epistula Morbosani\ldblquote }}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Copia d\rquote una lettera che nel mcccxlv mando Morbastiano gransignore in Turchia al sonmo pontefice papa Clemento\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!) [Nachtrag: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 sexto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 ]. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (48\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Vorbemerkungen]{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Morbastiano e rey }}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 [korrekt: e Heberi di]}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Iessi coi suo}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 (!)}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 frategli Cherabi}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 e Lui Barchi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [korrekt:Iusbaic(h)]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, inperadore d\rquote Organtia con letterali conbattitori et nelle parti d\rquote Asia, signore al grande sacerdote romano sicondo i meriti diletto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (48\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -50\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Brief] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Nuouamente ad i nostri orecchi e peruenuto, come nelle ytaliche parti}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ad i prieghi et domandagione del uinitiano popolo publicamente noi fate di uulgare nelle nostre chiese, che qualunque persona prendera armi contro ad noi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Intendiamo ostilmente obstare et col fauore del diuino Neptunno\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 per lo mare Elesponstico et Dalmatiano in numerabili nostri naui per uenti et artificioso nauicare. Uorremo uenire nelle parti di septantrione, et massimamente intorno alla Dalmatia et alla Coruatia uisitare. Data anno Maometto 700 in itroito\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Messaleni primo di gennaio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Nicht ediert. Edition des lateinischen Texts: Epistola Morbisani magni Turcae ad Pium papam II, in: \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Pius II.\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Lettera a Maometto. Epistula ad Mahumetum (Epistola ad Mahumetum), Giuseppe \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Toffanin\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Neapel 1953, S. 181-182. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 Ibid., Ricc. 1094, 94}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 v}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 -95}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 Florenz, BNC, Palat., Panciatichi 24, 100}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 r}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 -101}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Zur lateinischen (und deutschen) Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung vgl. auch Bettina \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Wagner\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Sultansbriefe I 2, in: VL\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 2\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Bd. 11, coll. 1464-1465. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buchholz\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 352, nennt den Brief eine \u8222 \'84gelehrte Stil\u252 \'fcbung\ldblquote , allein durch die mythologische Anspielung auf Troja in dem Brief erkennbar. Auf fol. 49\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 einige Namen marginal vermerkt (\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Antenore, Henea, Priamo, Hector\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20). Der historische Kontext des Briefs ist der Kreuzzug von Smyrna (1343-1351) unter Papst Clemens VI. gegen das Emirat Aydin unter dem Emir\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Umur Bey (latinisiert Marbassanus). Die Br\u252 \'fcder Cherabi und Iusbaich sind unbekannt, eventuell ist einer der beiden der br\u252 \'fcderliche Nachfolger Umur Beys als{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f2\lang1055\fs20\chcbpat18 Emir, Mehmedo\u287 \'f0lu H\u305 \'fdz\u305 \'fdr Bey}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Dass der Brief nicht historisch ist, zeigt auch sein Schluss: 1345 waren Umur Beys Schiffe bereits vernichtet. Zum Kreuzzug, Marbassanus und den Briefen vgl. Mike \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Carr\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Merchant Crusaders in the Aegean 1291-1352, Woodbridge (Suffolk) 2015, S. 51-55; \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 David Nicolle\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 : Die Osmanen \endash 600 Jahre islamisches Weltreich, Wien 2008, S. 40, 50-51, 90-92; Kenneth \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Meyer Setton\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, The Papacy and the Levant, 1204\endash 1571: The thirteenth and fourteenth centuries, Philadelphia 1976, S. 194.}

Nuovamente ad i nostri orecchi e pervenuto come nelle italiche parti

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 50\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -57\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Marcus Tullius Cicero}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24, {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Oratio pro M. Marcello}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, italienische \u220 \'dcbersetzung \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Diceria di Tulio ad commendatione et gloria di Cesare, quando ad richiesta del senato di Roma ristitui Marco Marcello, il quale dallui era stato confinato fuori della patria, pero che era stato di quelli che ad i suo\rquote uoleri li sera opposto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (50\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Vorbemerkungen] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Incomincia lo exordio perche si fe la diceria\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >D<}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 opo le battaglie ciuili, essendo rimaso uincitore della battaglia}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Gaio Cesare, molti nobili huomini ciptadini erano fuori della cipta\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Della qual gratia uolendolo il senato ringratiare conmise ad Marco Tullio Cicerone, che intorno adcio dicesse quello che allui paresse. Il quale senato in pie fe cotale horatione\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (50\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -57\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Text] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Comincia la predetta horatione\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >I<}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 l lungo silento, padri conscritti, il quale io ad questi tempi}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 o usato, non per aulcuna paura. ma parte per dolore, parte per uergogna\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Per questo che tu ai facto oggi, ad i meriti che tu aueui facto inan\u231 \'e7i verso di me, e stato aggiunto grandissimo acrescimento. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Edition: \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Cicerone\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Pro Marcello. Volgarizzamento toscano gi\u224 \'e0 attribuito a Leonardo Bruni, Sara \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Berti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Florenz 2010. Zur Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung vgl. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Berti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 49-119. Zur Verfasserfrage (Anonymus, Brunetti Latini oder Leonardo Bruni \endash z. B. edierte Rezzi die Rede im 19. Jh. folgenderma\u223 \'dfen: Volgarizzamento secondo coll\rquote argomento della orazione di Marco Tullio Cicerone per M. Marcello fatto da Leonardo Bruni Aretino, in: Le tre orazioni di Marco Tullio Cicerone datte dinanazi a Cesare, volgarizzate da Brunetto Latini, Luigi M. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Rezzi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [ed.], Mailand 1832, S. 139-158), vgl. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Berti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 3-18.}
Dopo le battaglie civili essendo rimaso uincitore della battaglia
Il lungo silento padri conscritti il quale io ad questi tempi

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset162 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 58\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -59\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Brief}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ren\u233 \'e9s I., Herzog von Anjou}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24, an den K\u246 \'f6nig von Frankreich (Florenz, 20. Aug. 1442) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Copia d\rquote una lettera che di Firen\u231 \'e7e il re Rinieri mando al re di Francia ad 20 agosto 1442\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Sacratissime regie maiestati Francie Raynerius Apulie Ierusalem ac Sicilie rex salutem dicit. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Io o inteso con grande allegre\u231 \'e7a, quanto potentissimamente gli exerciti tuoi anno scacciato}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et messo in ruina et fuga i nostri anticani nemici inghilesi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Manda adunque et non tardare lo exercito et etiandio le lettere che iddio prestera gratia, quanto bisognera al tuo et mio buono et sincero animo. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition und Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung ermittelt. Als Adressat kommt zeitlich nur {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Karl VII.,}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 von 1422-1461 K\u246 \'f6nig von Frankreich, in Frage. Dieser war mit {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Marie d\rquote Anjou}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 verheiratet, einer Schwester Ren\u233 \'e9s I. Zum Inhalt vgl. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buchholz\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 350.}
Io o inteso con grande allegreca quanto potentissimamente gli exerciti tuoi anno scacciato

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset162 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 59\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -60\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 (Nicht versandter) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Brief}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ren\u233 \'e9s I., Herzog von Anjou}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24, an die Stadt Genua und ihren {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Dogen Tomaso Fregoso}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 (Florenz, 10. Sept. 1442) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Copia d\rquote una lettera facta in Firen\u231 \'e7e pel\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 re Rinieri per mandarla a Genoua et per la subita sua partita non la mando. Fu facta di x di settenbre 1442\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Rainerius rex Apulie Ierusalem ac Sicilie et Calabrie\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 populo uniuersitati ciuiun\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Janue ec etiam domino Thomaso Fulgosio duci salutem dicit. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Molto me molesto et graue udire le nostre differentie et contentioni ciuili}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, che tra uoi dopo la mia perduta di Napoli sono uenute\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 usando le braccia nostre, che a uoi daro grande\u231 \'e7a reputatione et credito apresso di molit popoli et la gratia didio concedente sabbasseranno molto e nemici nostri sotto di nostra possan\u231 \'e7a. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition und Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung ermittelt. In dem Brief ermahnt Ren\u233 \'e9 I. die Stadt Genua, die nach seiner Niederlage um Neapel ausgebrochenen Streitigkeiten untereinander zu beenden (\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 vgl. \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buchholz\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20, S. 350\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20). Zu Tomaso Fregoso (latinisiert Thomasus Fulgosius) vgl. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Sergio \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buonadonna\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 /Mario \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Mercenaro\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20, Rosso doge. I dogi della Repubblica di Genova dal 1339 al 1797, Genua 2007, S. 37 (dort mit falschem Todesdatum 1485).}
Molto me molesto et grave udire le nostre differentie et contentioni civili

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset162 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 61\plain \f1\i\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 -69\plain \f1\i\super\lang1033\fs24 r {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Brief}}\plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Leonardo Brunis}}\plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 an {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Giovanni Francesco I Gonzaga}}\plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 , Marchese von Mantua, \u252 \'fcber die {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Geschichte der Stadt Mantua}}\plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 (lib. 10, ep. 25) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 In Christi nomine. Epistola de messer Lionardo Aretino al signore di Mantua ridotta di latino in vulgare. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Dar\u252 \'fcber (mit Zeigehand versehen): Comincia l\rquote origine della cipta di Mantoua. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Non me ignoto, generosissimo signore, questa essere consuetudine}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 de gli huomini licterati, quando richiesti sono, che con loro scriuere alcuna quistione explicare debbono ... - ... Finalmente questa medesima gente anchora oggi non e la postrema di Ytalia, ma per i splendore et belle\u231 \'e7e di cicta et per grande\u231 \'e7a d\rquote ingegni et per ricche\u231 \'e7a et potentia, anima, gente di Ytalia accio che io sen\u231 \'e7a inuidia parli inferiore. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition. Abdruck der lateinischen Vorlage: Leonardo Bruni, Epistolarum libri VIII, Laurentius Mehus (ed.), Hildesheim 2006 (Nachdruck von 1741), S. 217-229. Dort als Briefschluss: Florenz, 27. Mai 1418. Zur Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung der volgarizzamenti vgl. James \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Hankins\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Repertorium Brunianum, Rom 1997, S. 256 (Index mit Verweis auf alle 43 Handschriften, darunter auch Mscr.Dresd.Ob.44); Id., Notes on the Textual Tradition of Leonardo Bruni\rquote s Epistolae familiares, in: Filologia umanistica per Gianvito Resta, V. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Fera\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 /G. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Ferra\plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 \u249 \'f9\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Bd. 2, Padua 1997, S. 1083-1122.}
Non me ignoto generosissimo signore questa essere consuetudine

Il circhuito di Toscana e migla septecento. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Quelle unbekannt, vgl. aber Relazione di Firenze di messer Vincenzo Fedeli, tornato da quella corte l\rquote anno 1561, in: Relazioni degli ambasciatori veneti al senato, Bd. 2, Eugenio \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Alberi\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), New York 2012 (1839), S. 323. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 [L\u228 \'e4nge des Arno] Il corso del fiume d\rquote Arno e migla centoventi. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Eventuell entnommen aus Giovanni \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Villani\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20, Istorie fiorentine fino all\rquote anno 1348, Bd. 1, \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Societa Tipografica De' Classici Italiani (ed.), \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Mailand 1802, S. 66-67. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 [Bist\u252 \'fcmer in der Toskana] >Cominciano i uescouadi che sono in Toscana.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 La chiesa apostolica et chiesa di san Piero di Roma}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 : Vescouado di Nepi, Vescouado antico di Sutri, Vescouado di Viterbo che fu detto Vegentia ... - ... Vescoua[do] di Lucca, prima conuertita alla fede didio che cipta di Toscana et il primo uescouo fu santo [Nachtrag NH2, s. o. Kodikologie: Paolino], Vescouado di Luni, Arciuescouado di Pisa, Vescouado di Uolterra. Finis. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Marginal Anmerkungen von NH1 (s. o. Kodikologie), z. B. zu Viterbo (Belle fonti), Lucca (seconda Firenze) oder Pisa und Volterra (vtile et vtile). \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 [Nachtrag der Schreibhand] Et credo che Monte Fiasconi sia cipta. [Nachtrag von NH1: ci \u232 \'e8 il uescouado].}
La chiesa apostolica et chiesa di san Piero di Roma

"hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >Q<}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 ui apresso si schriuerra una expositione d\rquote uno mago}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 che fu facta lla reina Giouanna dopo la morte del re Roberto, re di Yerusalem et di Sicilia, manifestando a decta reina, come l\rquote anima del re Andreas suo marito, il quale con uno laccio di seta ella ilse inpiccare nel castello d\rquote Auersa, era ad i pie di Yhesu Christo nostro redentore, domandando iustitia ... - ... che ogni persona si guardi dalla giustitia et uendetta didio, quando si fa quelle che non si dee. Comincia il mago et dice: \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (70\plain \f1\i\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 -74\plain \f1\i\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24) [Rede] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >O< }}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 inclita et magnanima reina, alla quale i fati minacciano}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di non so che granfati, ascoltami sola le parole mie, al quale la reina rispose. Di arditamente era che tu vuoi et uoi famigli. Scostateui alquanto et essi due rimasi soli, il mago comincio ... - ... Et apresso abbi reuerentia ad i suoi pastori. Ma se farai il contrario, s\rquote adenpieranno le schripture come t\rquote o detto, ma tu uolsarai. Finis. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition oder Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung. Auf fol. 74\plain \f1\i\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Korrektur einer Hand des 15. Jh.s/Beginn des 16. Jh.s in humanistischer Kursive. Zum Inhalt (vgl. \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buchholz\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20, S. 348): Der Magier prophezeit K\u246 \'f6nigin Johanna I. von Anjou eine Bestrafung durch das Schicksal, da sie ihren ersten Ehemann, {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Andreas von Ungarn}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20, t\u246 \'f6ten lie\u223 \'df. Der Anlass der Rede ist der Tod des zweiten Ehemanns, Robert I. von Anjou. Sein Todesjahr 1343 bildet den terminus post quem dieser wohl fiktiven Rede. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Rest von fol. 74\plain \f1\i\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 leer.}
Qui apresso si schriverra una expositione d’uno mago
O inclita et magnanima reina alla quale i fati minacciano

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 75\plain \f1\i\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Frate Stoppa de\rquote Bostichi}}\plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 : {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Canzone}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 >Can\u231 \'e7ona di frate Stoppa, la quale mando al re Roberto, re del reame di Napoli, singularissimo principe.< \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >S<E la fortuna e \lquote l mondo / mi vuol pur contastare}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 / non me ne uo\rquote turbare / an\u231 \'e7i ringratio il mio signor giocondo ... - ... ma solo [Ed.: sempre] si trastulla / et a Dio serue con l\rquote animo giocondo [Ed.: facondo] / Sella (!) fortuna e \lquote l mondo etc. Finis. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Edition: A. \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Medin\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20, Ballata della Fortuna, in: Il propugnatore (22, n. s.) 1889, S. 101-144. Kommentierte Ausgaben: Poeti minori del Trecento, Natalino \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Sapegno\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Mailand 1952, S. 428-432 (dort unter Anonymus aufgef\u252 \'fchrt); Piero \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Cudini\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Poesia italiana del Trecento, Mailand 1978, S. 166-169. Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung: {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Florenz, BML, Conv. soppr. 122, 105}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 -106}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Ibid., Gaddi 198, 113}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 -114}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[2].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Ibid., Pl. 90 inf. 47, 36}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[2].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 ra-rb}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[3].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Florenz, BNC, Magl. VII.1078, 4}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[3].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r-v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Florenz, BNC, Nuovi acquisti e accessioni 339, 77}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 -78}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Florenz, BR, Ricc. 1050, 56}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 -57}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; Zur Person vgl. Maria Antonia \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Gronchi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, in DBI (13) 1971, S. 347-348, sowie Weiterf\u252 \'fchrendes zum Gedicht vgl. Irene \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Tani\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, online: http://www.mirabileweb.it/title/se-la-fortuna-o-l-mondo-stoppa-(frate)-de-bostichi-title/40627. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Stoppa Bostichi soll die Canzone zwischen 1315-1328 in Lucca auf der Piazza San Michele in Mercato vorgetragen haben (vgl.\plain \f1\lang1033\fs16 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Le Croniche di Giovanni Sercambi, Bd. 3, S. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bongi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Lucca 1892, S. 274).}
Se la fortuna e ‘l mondo mi vuol pur contastare

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}{\f3\fnil\fcharset162 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 76\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ewiger Kalender zur Berechnung des Monatsersten}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 (mit dem Beispieljahr 1440) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Regel] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 A trouare in che di entra il mese per tucto il tenpo}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et in che millesimo si a. Et prima si vuole partire gli anni domini per xxviij et quello ti rimane \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 che ti uiene meno il numero, in quello di entro o entrerra quel mese del quale si vuole sapere. De quali mesi la regola si e questa: \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [in hellerer Tinte] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Mar\u231 \'e7o a nome 2, Aprile 5\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Gennaio 0, Febraio 3\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [Beispieljahr 1440; 1. Satz in hellerer Tinte] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Voglioti dare exenplo a decta regola et uoglo dire cosi}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 :\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Pognamo che tu uolessi sapere in che di entrerra maggio nel 1440. Cominciando sepre il millesimo a mar\u231 \'e7o, parti 1440 per 28 che ne uiene 51\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Et cosi questa regola segue ab ogni mese che si uolesse trouare\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Finis. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \u196 \'c4hnlich (ohne Beispieljahr) in Le regoluzze di maestro Paolo dell\rquote Abbaco matematico del secolo 14, Cesare \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Guasti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Prato 1860, S. 16. Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung: {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs18\chcbpat17 Florenz, BR, Ricc. 1070, 34}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 v}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs18\chcbpat17 -35}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs18 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs18\chcbpat17 Ibid., Ricc. 1297, }}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 65v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs18 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[2].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs18\chcbpat17 Ibid., Ricc. 1642, }}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[2].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 84r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; eventuell {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[3].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Florenz, BML, Plut. 42.20}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (\u8222 \'84Thesaurus Brunetti Latini\ldblquote , darunter nach \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bandini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Bd. 5, S. 188: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 In che d\u236 \'ec sara ogni Calendi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20).}
A trouare in che di entra il mese per tucto il tenpo
Voglioti dare exenplo a decta regola et voglo dire cosi

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 76\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Tafel der Osterfeste von 1440-1534}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 In questa seguente tauola che da pie si schriuerra, e da trouare la pasqua per ogni tempo. Nel 1440 fu la pasqua ad 27 di mar\u231 \'e7o et soci per ordine trouerrai come si schriuerra: 27 M\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [ar\u231 \'e7o]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, 16 A\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [prile] ... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Ma parmi che ci sia alcuno errore, per che la pasqua non puo passare i di ... d\rquote aprile. Finita la tauola del trouare la pasqua\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung: {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Florenz, BR, Ricc. 1071, 34}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Ibid., Ricc. 1297, 66}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[2].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Ibid., Ricc. 1642, 85}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[2].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (dort als Quelle \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Ysidero\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ({\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Isidor von Sevilla}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20) und \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Beda\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ({\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Beda Venerabilis}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20) sowie Beispiele um 1390 angegeben); eventuell {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[3].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Florenz, BML, Conv. Soppr. 148, 77}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[3].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[3].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 }}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (vgl. Lucia \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bertolini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Censimento dei manoscritti della \u8218 \'82sfera\lquote del dati, in: Annali della scuola normale superiore di Pisa, Classe di lettere e filosofia [12,2] 1982, S. 700), und Ibid., Plut. 30.26, 69\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Tafel korrekt (entgegen \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buchholz\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 353). Es ist zu beachten, dass die Ostertage nach dem julianischen Kalender berechnet sind. Zu solchen \u8222 \'84calendari perpetui\ldblquote vgl. Giovanni \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Ciappelli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Carnevale e Quaresima. Comportamenti sociali e cultura a Firenze nel Rinascimento, Rom 1997 (Temi e testi 37), S. 26ff. Dort auf S. 26 ein von Andrea di Domenico dello Struffa im Jahr 1444 kompiliertes Buch genannt, das u. a. eine \u8222 \'84tavola sommata a ritrovare la Pasqua [...] enth\u228 \'e4lt.}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 76\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Chronologische Notizen zu biblischen Ereignissen}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Dice san Gerolimo che il lunedi ad uscita d\rquote aprile fu il di che Chaino uccise Abel suo fratello. Secondo lunedi ad uscita d\rquote agosto fu, quando Soddoma subisso. Ter\u231 \'e7o lunedi al uscita di dicenbre fu, quando Giuda nacque. sono di multo guriosi in liber de anima\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 77\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -78\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezsoz[0].4600/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Kurie in Rom}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 :\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Liste der Kardinalbisch\u246 \'f6fe, -priester und -diakone, Einnahmen}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (77\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [7 Kardinalbisch\u246 \'f6fe] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Apresso si schriuerra il numero de cardinali, che possono essere in corte di Roma et titoli loro et prima vi sono septe uescoui cardinali che i titoli loro sono di cipta antichissime di terra di Roma. Et in ogni solennita sono assessari del papa\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >P<rimo e vescouo d\rquote Ostia il quale e piu degno}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 che gli altri, perche consacra il papa\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 S\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 eptimo uescouo di Tosculano\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (77\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [28 Kardinalpriester, je 7 zu einer der 4 Papstbasiliken in Rom] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 I preti cardinali sono ventocto, i quali anno ad uficiare alle quatro chiese catedrali. I primi septe debbono seruire a santo Pietro:< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >P<rimo e il cardinale di santa Maria in Tresteuere}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24...\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 I sicondi septe debbono seruire a santo Paolo al altare maggiore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 < ...\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (77\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 I terzi septe cardinali debbono seruire ad santa Maria Maggiore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 < ...\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 I quarti septe cardinali debbono seruire ad san Lorenzo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 < ... - ... >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 S\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 eptimo e il cardinale de santi Quatro Cardinali\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (78\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [16 Kardinaldiakone] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Apresso si fara mentione de sedici diacani\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 cardinali et de titoli loro:\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 < {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >P<rimo e il cardinale di santa Maria in Donica, che e arcidiacano}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 degli altri quindici cardinali\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 S\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 esto decimo e il cardinale di san Quirico\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (78\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Einnahmen der Kurie] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Essi examinato per persone ydonee et pratiche in corte di Roma, che per tucto il Christianesimo faccendo conto de l\rquote entrate, che anno tucti prelati,\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 che fanno la sonma anno per anno fiorini di camera septe milioni\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 la corte di Roma a d\rquote ordinaria entrata da secento a septecento migliaia di fiorini di camera\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung ermittelt.}
Primo e vescouo d’Ostia il quale e piu degno
Primo e il cardinale di santa Maria in Trestevere
Primo e il cardinale di santa Maria in Donica che e arcidiacano

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 78\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -80\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 Anonymus: {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Fiori e vita di filosafi e d\rquote altri savi e d\rquote imperadori}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24, \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 Exzerpte:\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 Spr\u252 \'fcche des Philosophen Secondo und des Origenes \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [Secondo] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Adriano inperadore essendo alla sua presentia Sicondo filosofo, il domando dopo molti parlari che ferono insieme di piu cose, alle quali Sicondo rispose, come apresso si fara mentione. E prima comincia a domandare\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 :<{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Che e il mondo? Sicondo risponde e dice, che}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 il mondo e uno cerchio che si uolge}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 sen\u231 \'e7a riposo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Che e quello che non lascia l\rquote uomo affaticare? Sicondo risponde et dice, che\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 < \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 quello che non lascia l\rquote uomo affaticare e il guadagnare con onesto titolo. Finis. \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Nachtrag:] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Et segue in questo al 204\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (= fol 202\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, s. u.). \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [Origenes] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Origenes dice\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 :< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Che}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 troppo e folle chi contende di passare la doue uede}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 che l\rquote altro sia caduto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Ma quegli e sauio che diuiene sollicito et maestro pel cadere de gli altri. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Einsch\u252 \'fcbe der Schreibhand: \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 1. [Nach der Frage \u8222 \'84Che e il sole?\ldblquote ] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Et nota del sole: \plain \f1\i\strike\lang1033\fs20 che\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 a sei cose notabili: La sua grande\u231 \'e7a e 166 uolte quanto e la terra\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 La calde\u231 \'e7a che e inextimabile in tanta distan\u231 \'e7a\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20.< \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 2. [Nach der Frage \u8222 \'84Che e fede?\ldblquote ] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 E Seneca sobgiugne et dice che la speran\u231 \'e7a nasce d\rquote uno bene che non ce certano\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20.< \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Edition: Anonymus, Fiori e vita di filosafi e d\rquote altri savi d\rquote imperadori, Alfonso \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 d\plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 \rquote \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Agostino\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Florenz 1979, S.214-224. Zur Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung (ohne diese Handschrift) vgl. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 d\plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 \rquote \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Agostino\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 9-20. Die meisten der 27 aufgef\u252 \'fchrten Codices befinden sich in Florenz. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Zur Autorschaft (die Rede wurde f\u228 \'e4lschlich Brunetto Latini zugeschrieben (z. B. [Ps.-]Brunetto \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Latini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Fiore di Filosofi e di molti savi, Antonio \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Cappelli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Bologna 1865) vgl. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 d\plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 \rquote \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Agostino\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 95-98. Die Spr\u252 \'fcche des Secondo tauchen oft isoliert in den Handschriften auf, was damit zusammenh\u228 \'e4ngt, dass der urspr\u252 \'fcnglich griechische Text aus dem 3. Jh. \u252 \'fcber die um 1167 entstandene lateinische \u220 \'dcbersetzung Eingang in Vincentius \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 von Beauvais\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Speculum historiale 10, 70-71, und in Ps.-Walter \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Burley\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Liber de vita et moribus philosophorum 122, Eingang gewonnen hat. Diese beiden Texte waren wiederum Quelle f\u252 \'fcr die italienischen \u220 \'dcbersetzungen. Vgl. dazu \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 d\plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 \rquote \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Agostino\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 97. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 80\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 leer.}
Fiori e vita di filosafi e d’altri savi e d’imperadori
Che e il mondo? Sicondo risponde e dice che il mondo e uno cerchio che si volge
Che troppo e folle chi contende di passare la dove vede

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset162 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 81\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Rechnungsaufstellung der von Florenz mit Hilfe einer Verm\u246 \'f6genssteuer get\u228 \'e4tigten Ausgaben f\u252 \'fcr den Krieg}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 gegen {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Filippo Maria Visconti, Herzog von Mailand}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Apresso si fara mentione de denari pagati per la signoria di Firen\u231 \'e7e, i quali pagano i ciptadini della terra per la guerra auuta con Filippo de Uisconti duca di Milando, cominciando l\rquote anno 1422 et del mese de\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [bricht ab]. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [Vorbemerkung: Anekdote aus Pisa zum Tod Viscontis] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Il qual duca mori domenica sera ad xiij d\rquote agosto ad ore due di nocte 1447}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. Et in tal sera circa a detta ora scadde che nella fornace di Palaia, che e fuori della porta Legatia di Pisa, ardendoui il fuoco che facea chuocere l\rquote opera sua, che d\rquote uno monte di roctame di mactoni \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, che ne cortile di decta fornace era, vsci una biscia grande et uolontaria si diri\u231 \'e7o uerso la bocca di decta fornace et come decto e ardendo, entro in decta bocca et quiui arse. Et questo io, \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 Michele di messer Rinieri Siminetti, cictadino fiorentino\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, ne fui essendo io in Pisa facto certo per piu ydonee persone che ui si trouarono\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Der Todestag Filippo Maria Viscontis (13. Aug. 1447) liefert den \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 terminus post quem \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 f\u252 \'fcr diesen Text. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Liste] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >P<}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 er le 52 prestan\u231 \'e7e coi risidii della nouina del 1422}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 : denari 890833. Pe\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 25 prestan\u231 \'e7oni et \u190 \'be che furono i primi: denari 892779\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Per 30 decine che fu la gratiosa posta nel 1443: denari \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Summe fehlt]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. Per 24 cinquine nuoue poste l\rquote anno 1444: d\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Summe fehlt]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. Per\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [bricht ab]. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung (der ersten vier Posten): {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Vatikanstadt, BAV, Barb. lat. 4051, 67}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Florenz, BNC, Magl. VIII 33, 50}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Vgl. Nicoletta \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Marcelli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Due note sulla \u8222 \'84Deifira\ldblquote di L. B. Alberti, in: Interpres (23) 2004, S. 182-199 (mit Auff\u252 \'fchrung der \u220 \'dcberlieferungstr\u228 \'e4ger, Transkription und Erkl\u228 \'e4rungen, z. B. zu \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 novina\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, auf S. 187-191). Erl\u228 \'e4uterungen zu den aus dem \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 catasto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, der Verm\u246 \'f6genssteuer, erzeugten Einnahmen bei \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buchholz\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 349.}

Consiglo ad iudicare tenpo et pensiero\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (82\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Abraam}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 disse al popolo in acto di comandamento che seruassono}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 tre cose, et prima che \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 T\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 emesse iddio, \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 A\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 masse iustitia et che \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 A\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 uesse in odio auaritia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (82\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >\plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 Marco Liuio romano\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, che del campo romano si parti et ando contro ad Asdrubale cartaginese, disse\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 :< >{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 C}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 ome io saro dinan\u231 \'e7i al canpo de\rquote nemici}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 benche non onesta riportero allegre\u231 \'e7a meritata de\rquote miei cictadini uinti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Es handelt sich um {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Marcus Livius Salinator}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Konsul mit dem folgenden {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Gaius Claudius Nero}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20.
