Zum Volgarizzamento s. o. fol. 82\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Marco Liuio romano\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (83\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Parole d\rquote \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 Anibale\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 adi Scipione, quando ando a Cartagine\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >C}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 ornelio Scipione, in far la pace e posto in tua liberta}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, ma se a bactaglia ti conduci, sara la fortuna ad chui iddio la dara\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Cosi m\rquote ingegnero che niuno si pentera della pace per me acquistata et facta\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (83\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -84\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Apresso si fara mentione della risposta che \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 Scipione\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 fe ad Anibale, quando ebbe inteso il suo parlare\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Scipione alle parole per Anibale decte in questa maniera rispos\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 e\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 ?) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 e disse\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[6].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >I<o non era ingannato, ma teneua per certo}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, o Anibale, che cartaginesi aueano speran\u231 \'e7a del tuo aduenimento et aspectauanlo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Potrenne\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 auere consiglo, ad cio che non abbiate ragione di ramacicarui\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Edition: Frate Jacopo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Passavanti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Lo specchio della vera penitenzia, Florenz 1725, S. 302-305. Quelle: Livius, Ab urbe condita 30, 30-31. Meist die Rede Hannibals deutlich l\u228 \'e4nger (Incipit: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 S\rquote egli per fatale dispositione\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20), die Antwort Scipios nach \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ramaricarui\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 noch nicht zu Ende (Explicit: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 che la pace non avete potuta patire\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20). }
Dice uno grande savio che in ciascuno opera dobbiamo usare iustitia
Abraam disse al popolo in acto di comandamento che servassono
Come io saro dinanci al canpo de’ nemici
Claudio Nerone consolo romano che ando contro ad Asdrubale cartaginese
Cornelio Scipione in far la pace e posto in tua liberta
Io non era ingannato ma teneva per certo

{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[4].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[4].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Papa Pelagio sicondo}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[4].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[4].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 venne a Pisa con piu suoi cardinali}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 a sagrare il duomo cioe santa Maria, loro principale chiesa, l\rquote anno \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 millecentodicenoue sexta calendi d\rquote octobre\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Beide Jahreszahlen (516 bzw. 26. Sept. 1119) falsch, da Pelagius I. von 556-561 und Pelagius II. von 579-590 das Papstamt aus\u252 \'fcbten. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (86\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Aufz\u228 \'e4hlung}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24, was bei Gott Gefallen und Missfallen hervorruft \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Gefallen] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Delle septe tenperan\u231 \'e7e che piu piacciono ad idio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 C}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 asto \endash in giouentu. Allegro \endash in veccie\u231 \'e7a}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Patientia \endash in aduersita et sofferen\u231 \'e7a \endash nelle sue uolonta\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Entspricht den Septem genera martyrii (z. B. in {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Innsbruck, ULBT, Cod. 541, 150}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 ra}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20). Identische italienische \u220 \'dcbersetzung (aber Platon zugewiesen) in \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Frate\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Tommaso\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Fiore di virt\u249 \'f9, D. G. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Volpi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 /B. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Gamba\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Mailand 1842, S. 113. Dieses Werk stammt vom Ende des 13./Anfang des 14. Jh.s. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Missfallen] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Tre cose sono che sommamente spiaccioni ad idio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[6].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Riccho \endash bugiardo. Vecchio \endash lussurioso et pouero \endash superbo}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Quelle: Bibel, Eccl. 25, 3-4. Identische italienische \u220 \'dcbersetzung (aber {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Salomon}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 zugeschrieben) in Fiore di virt\u249 \'f9, S. 121. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (86\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Sonntagsbuchstaben}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Nota che delle lectere domenicali corre questo anno 1434, corre la lettera A. Et ua insino al g. Poi si ricomincia al A et segue come decto e continouando. Le quali lettere domenicali si mectono nel numero de mesi che cominciano nella siconda faccia della carta di rinpecto ai 81\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (=fol. 81\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24). \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (86\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24){\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[3].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Paolo Dagomari}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 :\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[1].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 La regola della luna}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Et e da intendere che \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 Mastro Paolo\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 compuose \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 la regola della luna\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, che comincia nella faccia di rinpecto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (= fol. 87\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. Il primo di di gennaio 1375, che il primo concorrente fu A, et segue insino al T, et sappi ciascuno che 1080 punti fanno un\rquote ora et 60 minuta similemente fanno un\rquote ora\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Nota che ogni lunare e giorni 29, ore 12, punti 793, auisandoti che punti 1080 sono un\rquote ora. Sta in ciascuno segno il lunare di 2, ore 11, punti 66 {\pict\dibitmap0\wbmwidthbytes32\picw8\pich18\picwgoal120\pichgoal270 }\plain \f1\lang1033\fs18 . \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Cresce ciascuno di o manca punti 48, perche si dimostra che in di 22 et 24 punti cresce et iscema il di un\rquote ora\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Zum Autor s. u. Text auf foll. 87\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 -93\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, auf den auch die Schreibhand mit \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 nella faccia di rinpecto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 verweist. Text \u228 \'e4hnelt den \u8222 \'84Regoluzze\ldblquote Dagomaris, die Teil des auf foll. 87\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 -93\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 folgenden Werks sind, jedoch separiert abgedruckt worden sind, zuletzt in Paolo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 dell\plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 \rquote \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Abbaco\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Regoluzze secondo la lezione del codice 2511 della Biblioteca riccardiana di Firenze, Gino \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Arrighi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Prato 1966. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (86\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Erddurchmesser}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Gira il diametro del corpo della terra migla 21780\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.}
Notizen & Wetterregeln & Weihung & Aufzählung & Sonntagsbuchstaben & Erddurchmesser
Se piovera il di di san Processo et Martiniano sara l’astate grave
Ricordati che il di santo Vincenco se il sole
Se piove o nevica sara caro
Santo Pelagio papa sagro in Firence la chiesa di santa Maria Maggiore
Papa Pelagio sicondo venne a Pisa con piu suoi cardinali
Casto – in gioventu. Allegro – in veccieca
Riccho – bugiardo. Vecchio – lussurioso et povero – superbo

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 87\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -93\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Paolo Dagomari}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 (= Paolo dell\rquote Abbaco): {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 La regola quando la luna torna}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 (= {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Einf\u252 \'fchrung des Meton-Zyklus}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Questa, che apresso si schriuerra, e \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 la regola della luna\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, che conpilo lo excellente huomo \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 Mastro Paolo da Firen\u231 \'e7e\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, arismetico geometro et astrolago, \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 introducendo dicenoue lettere\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 del abc \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (= Meton-Zyklus)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, cominciando dal a et finendo al t et ciascuna di queste lettere corre un anno\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Pero uiene a correre questo anno 1451 A, et per dare ad intendere apresso si fara le caselle fino al\rquote anno 1479, che ricomincera al A. Et come decto e si pigla il di al coricare del sole\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Es folgt auf fol. 87\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 eine Tabelle mit den Jahren von 1451-1472 und den zugeordneten Buchstaben des Alphabets. Im Anschluss auf foll. 87\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 -93\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Grafiken: Auf jedem Folio separat ein Monat (\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 gennaio-dicembre\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20), die Spalten der Grafik enthalten: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 n\plain \f1\i\super\lang1033\fs20 o\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Tag des Monats), \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 di, concorrente, ore, punti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Folgende Notizen: \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (88\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20) [Februar] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Quando bisesta, che e ogni 4 anni una uolta, il mese di febbraiosi conta che abbi giorni 29\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Das gleiche Incipit \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Quando bisesta\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 in Vocabolario degli Accademici della Crusca, Neapel 1746, S. 270, s. v. bisestare, f\u252 \'fcr den Codex Andreini (= Florenz, BML, Conv. Soppr. 148) belegt. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (90\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20) [Juli] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Quando la luna e in quintadecima\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (= Vollmond)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20, poi nel suo scemare ogni nocte si leua piu tardi \u190 \'be d\rquote ora fino al suo uoltare, et chi dice {\pict\dibitmap0\wbmwidthbytes20\picw5\pich18\picwgoal75\pichgoal270 }\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs10 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 d\rquote ora\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (93\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Finito il tacchuino della luna\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition (mit Ausnahme der Regoluzze, s. o. Text auf foll. 76\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20). XI 121, foll. 158-164}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[2].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Florenz, BR, Ricc. 1071, 26}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[2].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 r}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[2].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 -33}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[2].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (\u8222 \'84Questa e la ragione della luna, la quale e compilata sopra le dette soprascripte 19 lettere; seguono le tavole per gli anni 1356-1500, e quella dei mesi con le loro lettere, ore e punti\ldblquote , vgl. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Morpurgo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 60. Der gleiche Codex enth\u228 \'e4lt auch die Berechnungen zum Monatsersten und zum Osterfest [s. o. foll. 76\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ]);\plain \f1\lang1033\fs18 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[3].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs18\chcbpat17 Ibid., Ricc. 1297, 66}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[3].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (La regola della luna); {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Ibid., Ricc. 1341, 72}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 -74}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[4].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (Corso della luna, chiamao tacchuino); {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Ibid. Ricc. 1642, 78}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 -81}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[5].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[6].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Ibid. Ricc. 1696, 46}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[6].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[6].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 -53}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[6].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Nach der kurzen Beschreibung in Paul Oskar \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Kristeller\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Iter Italicum, Bd. 5, S. 307, ist {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[7].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 New York, Columbia Univ. Libr., Plimpton Ms. 167}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, eine weitere eventuelle Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung (Inhalt: Trattato d\rquote Abbaco, d\rquote astronomia, e di segreti naturali e medicinali). Ein Digitalisat von fol. 123\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 dieses Codex zeigt eine \u228 \'e4hnliche Grafik des Meton-Zyklus f\u252 \'fcr die Jahre 1395-1412 (vgl. online: http://ds.lib.berkeley.edu/PlimptonMS167_20). Et sen\u231 \'e7a pi\u249 \'f9 dire priego iddio che consoli uoi et loro\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Textverlust durch Ausfall der ehemaligen foll. LXXXXVIII-LXXXXVIIII (von \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 coro\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [ne e regni le lor miserie] bis [approveranno e] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 quello\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20). morire\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (110\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Brief 1] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Cominciano le lectere che Seneca mando ad Paolo et da Paolo ad Seneca\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 S\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 eneca ad Paolo salute. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 O Paolo, io credo che ad te fu cesto quello che noi tractamo}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ieri col nostro amico Lucillo delle apocrisis et altre cose\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et informarsene et uenirne ad prefectione. Io desidero, fratello, che tu sia ben sano et saluo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (110\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) Brief 2, (110\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -111\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) Brief 3, (111\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) Brief 4, (111\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) Brief 5, (111\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Brief 6] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Paolo ad Seneca et ad Lucillo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, (111\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Brief 7] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Seneca ad Paolo et ad Theofilio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, (111\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -112\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) Brief 8, (112\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) Brief 9, (112\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) Brief 10, (112\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) Brief 11, (112\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -113\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) Brief 12, (113\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) Brief 13, \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (113\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Brief 14] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Paolo ad Senecam\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 < >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 S\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 eneca Paolo salute. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ad te scorgendolo tu quelle cose sono reuelate}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, che a poche idio concedecte\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 san\u231 \'e7a conrompimento partorisce nuoua anima, affrectandosi quindi ad idio. Sia sano Seneca carissimo ad noi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Finiscono le pistole, et comincia lo epitaffio dello sippolatura di Seneca.\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 < \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [Epitaph] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Chura fatica merito honori riceuuti per guiderdone\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 I}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 te dopo questo sollecitate l\rquote altre anime, me dilungi da uoi}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. Dio chiama soctrai compiute le cose terrene. O terra peregrina ad idio niente di meno tu auara togli il corpo ne solenni sassi, pero che l\rquote anima al cielo et l\rquote ossa rendiamo ad te. Laus deo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Edition nach dem Codex Paris, BNF, Fr. 12235: Luca \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bellone\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Il volgarizzamento italiano delle \u171 \'abEpistole di Seneca a Paolo e di Paolo a Seneca\u187 \'bb secondo il codice Fr. 12235 della Biblioth\u232 \'e8que Nationale de France, in: Filologia e Linguistica. Lucia \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bertolini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, I volgarizzamenti italiani degli apocrifi (secc. XIII-XV): un sondaggio, in: Seneca. Una vicenda testuale, Florenz 2004, S. 357-364. Im Anschluss (S. 365-370) vier Textzeugen mit Abbildungen. Der Briefwechsel ist eine F\u228 \'e4lschung des 4. Jh.s. Seinetwegen verfasste Hieronymus zu dem heidnischen Seneca eine Biographie, weshalb die F\u228 \'e4lschung auf vor 392/93 zu datieren ist.}
Lucio Aennea Seneca fu spagnuolo d’una cipta chiamata Corduba
O Paolo io credo che ad te fu cesto quello che noi tractamo
Ad te scorgendolo tu quelle cose sono revelate
Ite dopo questo sollecitate l’altre anime me dilungi da voi

Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Zuweisung der Canzone an {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Francesco Petrarca}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ist falsch. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Edition: Liriche edite ed inedite di Fazio degli Uberti. Das Gedicht dort f\u228 \'e4lschlich {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Fazio degli Uberti}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 zugewiesen. ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Le stelle e \lquote l ciel\rquote rotante / sostenne in questa dolorosa ualle / cosi sostenga il mondo con le spalle. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (119\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -121\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Virgine, mater dei, et tu beata / fosti per madre di quel uerbo ecterno}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 / in quel loco superno\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 questo popol\rquote beato / san\u231 \'e7a diuisione a buon\rquote consiglio / viuendo senpre parte guelfa e \lquote l giglo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 / [bricht ab]. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Edition: Curt \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Rothe\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Dantea dresdensia, in: Deutsches Dante-Jahrbuch, (12) 1930, S. 136-138 bzw. 161-182. Mscr.Dresd.Ob.44 ist der \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 codex unicus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 f\u252 \'fcr beide Canzoni. Zur Canzone \u8222 \'84O alta prole\ldblquote und der Authentizit\u228 \'e4t des Autors vgl. auch Stefano \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Carrai\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Le muse dei Pulci. Studi su Luca e Luigi Pulci, Neapel 1985, S. 103-105. Kurze Anmerkungen zu beiden Canzoni in Marcel \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Simon\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Hercule et le christianisme, Stra\u223 \'dfburg 1955, S. 178-179. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Rest von fol. 121\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 leer.}
O alta prole del superno Giuve Alcida grande che facesti

VIIII] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Della ingratitudine\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[9].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[9].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 D}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[9].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[9].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 El huomo ingrato scende ogni uiltate}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 perc\rquote ogni bel seruire specta salute\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (122\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Rubr. LXXXVI] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Della golosita\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[10].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[10].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 O}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[10].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[10].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 appetito uergognoso et rio}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 che altra passione o ch\rquote altra sorte\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (123\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Rubr. XXXVI] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Del consiglo del uero amico\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[11].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[11].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 S}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[11].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[11].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ano e \lquote l consiglo del suo dolce amico}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.. - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et sol non erro\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, se ben noi sobcede\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (123\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Rubr. XXXV] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 De huomo uitioso\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[12].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[12].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 A}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[12].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[12].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Morto lume che per se non splende}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ne sa ne uede cammin\rquote di salute\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Edition (nicht eingesehen): Graziolo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bambaglioli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Commento al Trattato delle volgari sentenze sopra le virt\u249 \'f9 morali. Mscr.Dresd.Ob.44 kann nicht ber\u252 \'fccksichtigt worden sein, da das Vorkommen des Textes in der Handschrift bisher unbekannt. Edition ohne textkritischen Apparat: Graziolo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bambaglioli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Trattato delle volgari sentenze sopra le virt\u249 \'f9 morali, Massimo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Seriacopi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Genua 2006. II. III. 273}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ; {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[1].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Florenz, BML, Plut. 90 inf. 33}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. F\u252 \'fcr die 13 Handschriften mit dem \u8222 \'84Commentarius latinus in Trattato delle volgari sentenze sopra le virt\u249 \'f9 morali\ldblquote (darunter auch die beiden genannten Codices) vgl. online: http://www.mirabileweb.it/title/commentarius-latinus-in-trattato-delle-volgari-sen-title/183075. Zum Autor Graziolo Bambaglioli vgl. Aldo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Vallone\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, in: DBI (5) 1963, S. 640-642.}
Trattato delle volgari sentenze sopra le virtù morali
L‘ira che da virtu senpre diversa
Non dee il cor gentile irare contro al subggecto
L‘uomo che d’umil‘ loco e discendete
Amor tu dai dolce et sichura vita
Ogni tesoro avança il vero amico
L’uomo che solo al suo volere attende
Del huomo ingrato scende ogni uiltate
Sano e ‘l consiglo del suo dolce amico
A morto lume che per se non splende

... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 non ti rimanere pero d\rquote amonirlo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (123\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Disticha Catonis 1, 28] >{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 S}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 e tu ai figliuolo et non ai ricche\u231 \'e7e}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, fa loro aprendere alchuna arte, adcio che con quella possano difendere la pouera uita\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Es werden mindestens vier volgarizzamenti der Disticha Catonis unterschieden: volg. Aldini, volg. Marciano, volg. senese und volg. padovano. Editionen (mit anderem Wortlaut): Libro di Cato o tre volgarizzamenti del Libro di Catone de\rquote costumi, Michele Vannucci (ed.), Mailand 1829, S. 28 bzw. 32; Luigi \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Fumi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Il libro di Catone. Univ.) Padua 1990/91; Paolo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Sambin\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 /Gino \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Belloni\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Per la fortuna dei \u171 \'abDisticha Catonis\u187 \'bb in Italia: un nuovo volgarizzamento, in: \u171 \'abLe sorte dele parole\u187 \'bb. Testi veneti dalle origini all'Ottocento. Testo in volgare laziale (sec. XIII ex. - XIV in.), Utrecht, LOT 2005 (Diss. Univ. Leiden 2005). \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (123\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Seneca] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Seneca\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 M}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 iglore et piu utile e le ripriensioni et le bactiture del amico}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 che le lusinghe et le risa del nimico et del simulatore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Quelle gefunden. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (123\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Hieronymus] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Santo Gerolimo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 P}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Er la lossuria sola et non per altro peecato si legge che iddio disse}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 : Io me pento che io o facto l\rquote uomo. L\rquote opere che fa la lossuria sono queste: Debilisce il corpo, disfa et togle la buona fama\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Questo peccato nasce dal uitio della gola. E per niuno altro peccato fe mail iddio manifesta giustitia sen\u231 \'e7a misericordia, che per la lossuria\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Quelle gefunden. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (123\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Nota] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 So\u231 \'e7a cosa e et uituperosa a persona, che uolesse uiuere honestamente, ad usare con persone disordinate et triste et piene d\rquote infamia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.}
Quando tu amonisci alchuno per suo bene
Se tu ai figlivolo et non ai ricchece
Miglore et piu utile e le ripriensioni et le bactiture del amico
Per la lossuria sola et non per altro peecato si legge che iddio disse

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 123\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Regola a trovare, in che segno sia la luna}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Nachtrag von 1454 in humanistischer Minuskel] \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Eventuell zu dem Text auf fol. 93\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 geh\u246 \'f6rig. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 A sapere in che segno e la luna sappiendo quanti di ella a\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Radoppia i di della luna ragiugniui la meta de detti di}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, poi detto numero, che ne uiene di detto raddoppiamento\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 che sono 3/12 di segno, cioe \u188 \'bc che sono 7 1/2 gradi et 1/3 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 siche viene a gradi 16 \u189 \'bd di lione\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Nach \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buchholz\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 355, steht in der der Tabula die \u220 \'dcberschrift \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Regola \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [a tro]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 are in che segno sir\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [sic!]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 la luna\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Diese \u220 \'dcberschrift wohl auf fol. 5\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ganz unten, als Nachtrag der Schreibhand. Der Text selbst jedoch allein von der Nachtragshand geschrieben. Zur Datierung des Nachtrags (vgl. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buchholz\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 355-356) dient folgende Aussage (fol. 123\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20): \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 la luna fece nel 1454 d\rquote agosto a di 23 et oggi che siamo a di 19 di septenbre a 27 di\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Eventuell steht der Text ebenfalls in Zusammenhang mit dem Werk von {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Paolo Dagomari}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (s. o. foll. 87\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 -93\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20).}
Regola a trovare, in che segno sia la luna
Radoppia i di della luna ragiugnivi la meta de detti di

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 124\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Astronomische Tabelle}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 (Anzahl der Sonnenstunden pro Tag) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Die Grafik umfasst 13 Spalten. Die erste Spalte beinhaltet die Tage von 1-30, die erste Zeile die 12 Sternzeichen (Aries bis Fische). Zu jedem Tag wird in den Feldern die Zahl der Sonnenstunden angegeben. Am unteren Ende Nachtrag der gleichen Hand wie auf fol 123\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \u196 \'c4hnlicher Titel in {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Florenz, BML, Plut. 30.26, 69}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Cerchio che dimostra in quale pianeta sia lo Sole e quante hore e quanti minuti lo Sole sia intrato infra la decta pianeta\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20), aber mit anderer Grafik. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 124\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 leer.}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 125\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -136\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Papstchronik}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 von {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Petrus}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 bis {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Gregorius XII.}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24,\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 in Terzinen \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Quanti papi sono stati infino a papa Gregorio duodecimo.\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 ] \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 I priego te, signore, che la tua gratia / risplenda in me, a saper\rquote prouedere}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24... E al nostro primo padre, re di gloria, / Christo Yhesu, incomincia il mio metro / che fu principio di nostra uictoria / el qual lascio le chiaui a santo \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 Pietro\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24... Dopo del qual\rquote uaco \lquote l santo papato / reggendo \plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 Lino et Cleto\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et non nel manto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Adcio che piu non segua tal discordia, ma d\rquote un uolere et puro sentimento / eleghino uno monarcha di concordia, / Signori, i sono in\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [expunxit] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 fin qui col parlamento\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition und Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung ermittelt. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Terminus post quem\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 des Gedichts ist die Wahl des letztgenannten Papstes Gregorius XII. im Jahr 1406, \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 terminus ante quem \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 die am Ende ge\u228 \'e4u\u223 \'dferte Hoffnung auf die \u220 \'dcberwindung der \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 discordia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, d.h. des abendl\u228 \'e4ndischen Schismas. Dies geschah 1417 mit der Wahl {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Martins V.}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 zum Papst. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 136\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 leer.}
I priego te signore che la tua gratia risplenda in me a saper’ provedere

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 137\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -138\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Florentinische Gesandtschaft}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 zu {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Papst Bonifatius VIII.}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 (1300) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (137\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Liste der teilnehmenden Gesandten] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 In gloria della cipta di Firen\u231 \'e7e\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Apresso si fara mentione di dodici inbasiadori fiorentini mandati}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 nel 1300 ad Roma a papa Bonifatio octauo da piu principi et altre signorie: Messer Vermiglo Alfani, caualiere con grante et solenne conpagnia, inbasciadore dello inperadore. Messer Muciacto de\lquote Fran\u231 \'e7esi ... Messer Vgolino da Vicchio ... Messer Rinieri Langru ... Messer Manno degli Adimari ... Messer Guicciardo de\lquote Bastari ... Messer Guido Talancha ... Messer Simone de\lquote Rossi ... Messer Benchuenni Folchi ... Messer Bernardo Eruai ... \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (137\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Messer Lapo di messer Farinata degli Vberti ... Messer Cino di ser Dietisalui, con grande et solenne conpagnia, inbasiadore di messer Gherardo da Varano, signore di Camerino\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (137\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -138\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Verwunderung des Papstes \u252 \'fcber die Gesandtschaft aus Florenz] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Andando il detto papa Bonifatio un di aspasso per l\rquote abitatione sua}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di santo Iohanni con assai cardinali et con gran conpagnia di prelati, et marauiglandosi assai di tanta magnificentia della cipta di Firen\u231 \'e7e\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Io dico: I fiorentini sono il quinto helemento et cosi adpruouo. Et Benciuenni, inbasciadore del gran Mastro di Rodi, et Cino, inbasciadore del signore di Bamerino, noi gli pronutiamo per caualieri et cosi sieno\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung: Consiglio \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 dei Cerchi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Libro di Ricordanze, in: Archivio di Stato di Firenze, Cerchi 312 (1421-1462), 45\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 ff. Lateinische Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung:\plain \f1\lang1033\fs18 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs18\chcbpat17 Florenz, BML, Plut. 26, sin. 8 (1377-1383; Frate Tedaldo della Casa), 1}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 r-v}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Diese eventuell nur erfundene Anekdote stammt aus dem 14. Jh. und fand im 15. und 16. Jh. weite Verbreitung. So nahm sie z. B. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Cristoforo Landino}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 in seinen Dante-Kommentar (Kap. II: Apologie) auf, vgl. Cristoforo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Landino\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Comento sopra la comedia, Bd. 1, Paolo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Procaccioli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Rom 2001, S. 239). Vgl. dazu Claudia \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Tripodi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, I fiorentini \u8222 \'84quinto elemento dell\rquote universo\ldblquote , in: Archivio storico italiano (168) 2010, S. 491-515 (mit Abdruck der Textpassagen).}
Apresso si fara mentione di dodici inbasiadori fiorentini mandati
Andando il detto papa Bonifatio un di aspasso per l’abitatione sua

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 138\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Sinnspr\u252 \'fcche}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (138\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Seneca}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Egli e necessario che qualunque e occupato da i uitii}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. Se con effecto et virilita\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 non e conosciuto da colui che e occupato an\u231 \'e7i signoreggiato da i uitii, insino a tanto che egli uol perde\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (138\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Tre si dicono nel mondo infelici. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Infelice colui che sa molte cose}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et ad opera le ynique\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?). \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Colui non conosce dolce, che non a ghustato amaro. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 et chi non si contrista, a rade uolte allegre\u231 \'e7a. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Qualsisia del l\rquote uomo l\rquote origine o delle parole\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Ma la bonta di costoro basta. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 L\rquote uomo pieno non sa che uita si meni ei pouero. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Et mentre che tu siedi a mensa, prima del pouero pensa\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Die letzten beiden Sinnspr\u252 \'fcche sind \u220 \'dcbersetzungen aus den \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Regulae cenandi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 des 13. Jh.s, vgl. Elisabetta \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Carli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Liber de coquina. Ricette di cultura medievale, 2013, S. 4.}
Egli e necessario che qualunque e occupato da i uiti
Infelice colui che sa molte cose

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 139\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -142\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 (Maestro)\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Antonio Beccari (da Ferrara)}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 : {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Canzone XXII}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 ({\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Credo di Dante}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Credo di {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Dante Alighieri}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24.{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Io schrissi gia d\rquote amor piu uolte rime, / quanto piu seppi dolci}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 belle et uaghe / e \lquote n pulirle operai tucte mie lime\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ora per noi, che iddio si ci perdoni, / e dieci gratia a uiuer\rquote si quagiu / che paradiso al nostro fin ci doni. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 F\u228 \'e4lschlich Dante Alighieri zugeschrieben und als Credo eingeordnet. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Edition: Antonio \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Beccari\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Rime, Laura \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bellucci\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Bologna 1967, S. CV-CXXV bzw. S. 61-71. Kommentierte Ausgaben: Le rime di Maestro Antonio da Ferrara, Laura \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bellucci\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Bologna 1972, S. 93-106; \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Piero \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Cudini\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Poesia italiana del Trecento, Mailand 1978, S. 79-87. Zur Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung (ohne diese Handschrift) vgl. Belucci, S. IX-CLXXXVI; Irene \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Tani\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20, online: \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 http://www.mirabileweb.it/title-rom/io-scrissi-gi\u224 \'e0-d-amor-pi\u249 \'f9-volte-rime-antonio-becca-title/LIO_37358\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.}
Io schrissi gia d’amor piu volte rime quanto piu seppi dolci

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 143\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -145\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ps.-Bernhard von Clairvaux}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 :{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Epistola di S. Bernardo a Raimondo}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, italienische \u220 \'dcbersetzung \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Pistola di San Bernardo. Al glorioso et felice caualiere {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ramondo}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, signore di castello Ambruogio, Bernardo, uenuto in uecchie\u231 \'e7a salute. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Tu adimandasti (!) essere insegnato da noi del modo della chura}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et della regola familiare, come piu utilemente si dee gouernare\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 il quale preso bera con esso il calice del dolore, il quale desidero. Al quale la preducera la sua dannabile uecchie\u231 \'e7a. Amen. Explicit hepistola beati Bernardi ad quedam milite de chura regi familiari\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Der Brief wird {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Bernhard von Chartres}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 zugeschrieben, vgl. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Amico\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (s. u. Edition), S. 5. Marginal Notizen und Kommentare der Schreibhand. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Editionen (ohne Mscr.Dresd.Ob.44): Ugo Antonio \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Amico\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Epistola di San Bernardo a Raimondo. Volgarizzamento del buon secolo, Bologna 1866; Cesare \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Stocco\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Epistola di san Bernardo sul modo di governare la famiglia al cavaliere Raimondo signore del Casello di S. Ambrogio. Volgarizzamento inedito tratto da un codice della Marciana, Venedig 1856. Zu weiteren Drucken vgl. Francesco \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Zambrini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Le opere volgari a stampa dei secoli XIII e XIV, Bologna 1878, col. 65-68. Tu adimandasti essere insegnato da noi del modo della chura

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 145\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -154\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Libro delle venture (= Libro delle sorti, Losbuch)}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Comincia il libro delle uenture, il quale s\rquote ordina in questo modo: {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Se uorrai sapere che uentura sara quella d\rquote uno huomo o d\rquote una donna}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, domanda vna delle diciocto uenture schricte nella faccia di rinpecto a carte cxlviii \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (= fol. 146)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. Et poi gecta tre dadi et anouera a quanti punti e quella ventura che vuoi sapere, insino a tanti a quanti punti ai gictati. Et quella ti dimostrerra, doue debbi andare et quiui guarderai. Sono pure poste qui di socto le robriche della tauola\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (145\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Verzeichnis von 18 Schicksalen, aus denen eine auszuw\u228 \'e4hlen ist] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 1. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Se vuoi sapere, in che sarai aduenturato, ua al leone}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. 2. Se vuoi sapere, quanto venerai, ua al dragone\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 17. Se vuoi sapere, se sara pace o guerra, ua al chane. 18. Se vuoi sapere, se adoperi il tuo tempo male o bene, ua al sole\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (146\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -154\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Verzeichnis von 18 Sternzeichen, jedes mit 18 m\u246 \'f6glichen Antworten ausgestattet] \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (146\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Sole\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 < \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 1. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Bense sauio di tale cosa adimandi}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 18. Tu fai quello che la uentura, ma non e ancora tempo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (146\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >\plain (151\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Leone\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <, (152\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >\plain \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (154\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Aquila.\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 < \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 1. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Tu uai cerchando la morte tua}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 18. Pienamente ti uerra facto tucto il tuo intendimento et de ragioneuole\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition und Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung ermittelt. Es handelt sich um ein Schicksalsbuch. bei dem man auf eine aus einem Katalog von 18 Fragen ausgesuchte Frage mit W\u252 \'fcrfeln zu einer Antwort gelangt. Keine \u196 \'c4hnlichkeit mit den 1482 von {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Lorenzo Spirito Gualtieri}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (vgl. u .a. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Venedig, BNM, It. IX.87}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [=6226]) und 1490 von Francesco Marcolini (vgl. Forl\u236 \'ec, Bibl. Comun. \u8222 \'84Aurelio Saffi\ldblquote , Ms. I 66) fertiggestellten Losb\u252 \'fcchern.}
Libro delle venture & Libro delle sorti
Se vorrai sapere che ventura sara quella d’uno huomo o d’una donna
Se vuoi sapere in che sarai adventurato va al leone
Bense savio di tale cosa adimandi
Tu vai cerchando la morte tua

Prisciano grammatico fe molte belle opere, et uisse al tenpo di Giustiniano inperadore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. (206\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Galieno\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 G\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [bricht ab]. Fortsetzung zu Galen von einer Hand des 15. Jh.s in humanistischer Minuskel: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Galieno naque a Pergamo, notabile medico presso a Troia, uisse anni 87 al tempo d\rquote Antonino Pio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Marginal Anmerkungen, darunter stets die im Text vorkommenden Namen (z. B. die Quellen) exzerpiert. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Keine Edition. Edition des lateinischen Texts: Gualterus \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Burlaeus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Liber De vita et moribus philosophorum. Mit einer altspanischen \u220 \'dcbersetzung der Eskurialbibliothek, Hermann \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Knust\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), T\u252 \'fcbingen 1886; John O. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Stigall\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, The De vita et moribus philosophorum of Walter Burley. An Edition with Introduction, Diss. Univ. Colorado 1956. Der Text beruht urspr\u252 \'fcnglich auf den \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Vitae philosophorum\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 des {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Diogenes Laertius}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Zur Verfasserfrage der italienischen \u220 \'dcbersetzung und der f\u228 \'e4lschlichen Zuweisung der lateinischen \u220 \'dcbersetzung an Walter Burley vgl. Mario \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Grignaschi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Lo Pseudo Walter Burley e il \u8222 \'84Liber de vita et moribus philosophorum\ldblquote , in: Medioevo (16) 1990, S. 131\endash 190, sowie Idem, \u8222 \'84Corrigenda et addenda\ldblquote sulla questione dello Ps. Burleo, in: Ibid., S. 325\endash 354. Zu einer m\u246 \'f6glichen Vorlage Ps.-Walter Burleys vgl. Tiziano \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Dorandi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, La versio latina antiqua di Diogene Laerzio e la sua recezione nel Medioevo occidentale: il Compendium moralium notabilium di Geremia da Montagnone e il Liber de vita et moribus philosophorum dello ps.Burleo, in: Documenti e studi sulla tradizione filosofica medievale (10) 1999, S. 371-396. Zur Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung vgl. John O. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Stigall\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, The manuscript tradition of the De vita et moribus philosophorum of Walter Burley, in: Medievalia et Humanistica (11) 1957, S. 44-57. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Der Text zum Philosophen Secondo (foll. 202\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 -206\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20) wiederholt das bereits auf foll. 78\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 -80\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 niedergeschriebene Gespr\u228 \'e4ch zwischen Secondo und Adriano. Der Wortlaut des Texts ist jedoch anders, vgl. dazu die \u196 \'c4u\u223 \'dferungen von \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buchholz\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 356-357, und Anonymus, Fiori e vita di filosafi e d\rquote altri savi d\rquote imperadori, Alfonso \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 d\plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 \rquote \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Agostino\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Florenz 1979, S. 97. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 207\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 leer.}
Liber de vita et moribus philosophorum
Tales filosafo fu d’Asia et fu il primo de septe saui de’ greci

B. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs18\chcbpat17 Florenz, BR, Ricc. 1030 48}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 v}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs18\chcbpat17 -50}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5007[0].501m/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 r}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20) oder {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Martin}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 von Troppau}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Chronicon Pontificum et Imperatorum 1, 4. In beiden Werken werden 18 Stadttore aufgez\u228 \'e4hlt. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (208\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ma\u223 \'dfe Roms}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Roma gira ad l\rquote ontorno }}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 (!)}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 cento uentisei miglaia}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di braccia et a trecento sessanta torri\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 le postiche\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 eran di legname et le maestre drento di metallo con intagli et di fuori ferrate\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Die gleiche Zahl an T\u252 \'fcrmen (360) in Martin \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 von Troppau\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Chronicon Pontificum et Imperatorum 1, 4, sonst jedoch keine \u220 \'dcbereinstimmungen. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (208\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Eigenschaften der Sonne}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Le proprieta del corpo del sole. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Prima che egli e grande, 166 uolte quanto e tucta}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 la terra, la quale e migla 21780. Siconda che la sua uelocita e tanta che in una ora ua migla 800. Ter\u231 \'e7a che e tanto l\rquote ordine suo che non ismaga mai. Quarta e la distantia sua che e migla 450.000. Quinta che la sua luce e maggiore d\rquote ogni lume. Sesta si e che la sua chalde\u231 \'e7\u231 \'e7a e inextimabile in tanta distantia. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Wiederholung des Einschubs auf fol. 78\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Dazu der Abstand der Sonne zur Erde (450.000 Meilen) auf fol. 204\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 marginal vermerkt. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (208\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Berechnungen zur Arche Noah}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 L\rquote archa di Noe fu lunga gomita trecento, alta gomita cinquanta}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et larga gomita trenta. Duro la pioggia quaranta di et quaranta nocti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 sopra al piu alto monte del mondo gomita quindici\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Quelle: Bibel, Gen. 6-7. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (208\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Periodisierung der Welt in 7 Zeitalter}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Quanto e che il mondo fu chriato. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Il primo huomo del mondo fu Adamo}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, dalquele in qua sono state sei heta. La prima fu da Adamo ad Noe\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Septima heta si schriue che comincera quando iddio uerra a giudichare il mondo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Quelle: Aufteilung der Welt in 6 Zeitalter bei {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Augustinus}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, De Genesi contra Manichaeos 1, 35-41. Vgl. dazu Therese \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Fuhrer\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Erneuerung im Alter: Augustins aetates-Lehre, in: Altersz\u228 \'e4suren. Zeit und Lebensalter in Literatur, Theologie und Geschichte, T. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Fitzon\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 et alii (edd.), Berlin 2012, S. 261-287.}

Agostino, De ciuitate Dei, in il 1\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [.?] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 libro del \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 [...?]. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (208\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Augustinus] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Item. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Piu e da dolere della anticha pouerta}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 [...?] }}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 che dell}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 [e]}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 antiche ricche\u231 \'e7e\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (208\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Trajan] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Traiano. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Essendo Traiano ripreso a suoi amici}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Io uoglio essere tale inperadore, quale ogni huomomi desidera\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (209\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Xerxes] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 N}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Arra Paolo Eurosio che Serse, re di Persia}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, fe uni exercito grandissimo, nel quale fu huomini sectecento miglaia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et quatro mila naui da portare victuvagla et arnesi bisgneuoli ad conbactere\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Quelle: {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[4].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Paulus Orosius}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Historiae adversus paganos 2, 9. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (209\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [T. Manlius Torquatus] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 M\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 aulo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Fabbio disse: {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[4].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[4].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 S}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[4].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[4].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 E uoi mi costrignerete che io facci l\rquote uficio}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, ne io potro conportare i uostri costumi ne uoi la mia signoria\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Quelle: {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[5].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Valerius Maximus}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Facta et dicta memorabilia 6, 4, 1. Edition einer \u220 \'dcbersetzung des 14. Jh.s (nicht identisch im Wortlaut): \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Valerius Maximus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, De\rquote fatti e detti degni di memoria. Della citt\u224 \'e0 di Roma e delle stranie genti. Testo di lingua del secolo XIV, Roberto \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 de Visiani\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Bologna 1868, S. 432. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (209\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Stadt Cinginnia] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 C}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Irania }}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 (!)}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 nominata cipta di Spagna duramente ritenne l\rquote armi}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 contro a Decio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Bruto. Il quale Decio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 mando loro uno ambasiadore per cerchare accordo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 le quali defendessono lo cipta et non oro, chol quale riconperassono la liberta dallo auaro inperadore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Quelle: Val. Maximus, Facta et dicta memorabilia 6, 4, ext. 1. Volgarizzamento nur zum Teil \u252 \'fcbereinstimmend mit Valerio \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Massimo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, De' fatti e detti degni di memoria della citt\u224 \'e0 di Roma e delle stranie genti, Roberto \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 de Visiani\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Bd. 2, Bologna 1868, S. 435.}
L’usanca del senato di Roma ora a tenpo
Piu e da dolere della anticha poverta che delle
Essendo Traiano ripreso a suoi amici
Narra Paolo Eurosio che Serse re di Persia
Se voi mi costrignerete che io facci l’uficio
Cirania nominata cipta di Spagna duramente ritenne l’armi

Tu pascua carmine claro\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 cessurus ueterum, te vulgo mille laboris / per celebrem faciunt, etas te nulla silebit\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Beide Epitaphien direkt hintereinander mit Verweis auf die Autoren bei {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Giannozzo Manetti}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Vita Iohannis Boccacci poetae Florentini (um 1440 entstanden).
