Hac sub mole iacent cineres ac ossa Iohannis
Inclite cur vates humili sermone locutus de te pertransis

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 209\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -210\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Valerius Maximus}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 : {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Facta et dicta memorabilia}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, Exzerpte in italienischer \u220 \'dcbersetzung \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Valerio narra nel octauo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [expunxit \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 septimo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 ] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 libro che \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [8, 7, ext. 11: Cleanthes] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ocleanso }}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 !)}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 uisse anni cento uno, il quale e incerto}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, quale fu piu da lodare, o discepolo o maestro\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Falsche \u220 \'dcbersetzung von Val. Max. (undecentesimum annum = 99 Jahre). \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [8, 13, ext. 1: Hiero] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Gerone, rectore di Sicilia agiunse al nouanta anni}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. Ierone, passato l\rquote anno octanta, genero figlihuoli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [8, 13, ext. 4: Arganthonius] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Arcatonio griditano }}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 (!)}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 octanta anni la sua patria resse}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, et quando uenne allo inperio, era di quaranta anni et fini anni cento trenta\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [8, 13, ext. 5: Herodot] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Erodoto schriue gli Etiopi tra passare nni cento uenti}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. Et quegli d\rquote India, de quali Ereseia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [expunxit: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Estia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 ; korrekt: Ctesias] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 racconta et Epimenides Grosio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, che uisse anni cento cinquanta septe. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [8, 13, ext. 6: Hellanicus, Damastes] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[4].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Telanicho (!) dice che alchuni degli Epipori}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, la quale contrada e parte di Ytalia, viuono anni dugento\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Et Damasci schriue ad Epimedes affermando\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di grandissima statura raghuno in se anni trecento di uita\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [8, 13, ext. 7: Alexander] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Alessandro nel uolume che conpuose del tracto del mare}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Ylirico, afferma che uno ciamato Dantone\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 adcio che \lquote l padre suo non paia poco bene gratioso, gli assegno altressi secento anni di uita\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Sauiamente decti o facti capitolo 2 nel libro septimo di Ualerio et negli exempli degli strani\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 : \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [7, 2, ext. 7: Aristophanes] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[6].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 La doctrina di Ristofane e piu alta prudentia, il quale}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 nella sua conmedia intradusse Pieride\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (= Pericles)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 tiranno degli Acteniesi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di ractenere quelle for\u231 \'e7e, le quali tu medesimo au nutrichate\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [7, 2, ext. 10: Philipp] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 De inde. Come fu laudabile la lettera di Filippo, re macedonico, nella quale in questa guisa riprese Alessandro, il quale sfor\u231 \'e7andosi di trarre ad se\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Filippo per la maggiore parte fu an\u231 \'e7i merchante di Grecia che uincitore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [8, 11, ext. 2: Alexander, Appelles, Lysippus] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[7].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Alessandro uolle essere dipinto da Adpelle}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et intagliato da Lesippe Orafo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [8, 11, ext. 3: Vulcanus, Alcamenes] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[8].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Vulachano intagliato per mano d\rquote Alchimede}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!). \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [7, 2, ext. 6: Xenocrates] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[9].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Senocrate disse che auere parlato alchuna uolta}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 se n\rquote era pentuto, ma d\rquote auere taciuto. non mi pente mai\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine \u220 \'dcbereinstimmung im Wortlaut mit folgender Edition (daher wohl Volgarizzamento einer anderen Handschrift): Valerio \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Massimo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, De' fatti e detti degni di memoria della citt\u224 \'e0 di Roma e delle stranie genti, Roberto \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 de Visiani\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Bd. 2, Bologna 1868. Edition des lateinischen Texts: Valerius\plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Maximus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Facta et dicta memorabilia, Bd. 2, John Briscoe (ed.), Stuttgart 1998. Zur Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung und verschiedenen Lesarten vgl. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 de Visiani\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 7-37 (ohne Nennung der Dresdner Handschrift).}
Ocleanso visse anni cento uno il quale e incerto
Gerone rectore di Sicilia agiunse al nouanta anni
Arcatonio griditano octanta anni la sua patria resse
Erodoto schrive gli Etiopi tra passare nni cento venti
Telanicho dice che alchuni degli Epipori
Alessandro nel volume che conpuose del tracto del mare
La doctrina di Ristofane e piu alta prudentia il quale
Alessandro volle essere dipinto da Adpelle
Senocrate disse che avere parlato alchuna volta

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 210\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -211\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Historische Notizen zu Florenz}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (210\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Tod des Maestro{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Agostino Romano}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 ] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Mori maestro Agostino Romano, generale degli Agostini}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, a Prato di xi nouenbre 1441. Disse fe alchuno miracolo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Eventuell identisch mit dem bei Ludwig \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 von Pastor\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Geschichte der P\u228 \'e4pste seit dem Ausgang des Mittelalters , Bd. 1, Freiburg 1925, S. 239, genannten \u8222 \'84Maestro Agostino Romani, generale de\lquote frati Heremitani, ambasciadore del commune die Firenze a Santo Padre\ldblquote (Dokument vom M\u228 \'e4rz 1438 in Florenz, Archivio di Stato, Cl. X, dist. I., n. 23, foll. 74-75). M\u246 \'f6glicherweise meinen Abrogio \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Landucci\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 /Fabritio \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Landucci\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Sacra Leccetana Salve, cio\u232 \'e8 origine e progressi dell\rquote antico, e venerabile Eremo e Congregatione di Lecceto in Toscana, Rom 1657, S. 50, dieselbe Person. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (211\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Einnahme San Miniatos al Tedesco] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Nel 1369 et di 9 di gennaio il comune di Firen\u231 \'e7e prese San Miniato al Tedesco}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et auutone intera possessione ferono piglare undici huomini, ad i quale in Firen\u231 \'e7e fu facto loro mo\u231 \'e7are il capo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Die Einnahme erfolgte erst 1370, vgl. Ranieri \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Sardo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Cronaca di Pisa, Ottavio \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Banti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Rom 1963 (Fonti per la storia d\rquote Italia 99), S. 197-198. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Aufz\u228 \'e4hlung der 11 hingerichteten M\u228 \'e4nner] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Messer Lodouico d ... de Cictioni, Bioagio di messer Ridolfo de Ciccioni, Filippo La\u231 \'e7erini de Bonromei, Nardo Monachelli da Marcignano\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Ser Niccholo di ser Salui di Saminiato, Amtonio di Filippo Magagnini ... Giouanni Guiducci di Saminiato, Luca Cioni da Siena, Bernaba uocato charoso da Cipta di Castello, Basano Bartolini da Lande\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, Filippo di Piero da Pistoia \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.... \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (211\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [B\u252 \'fcrgermeister von Fucecchio am 05. Nov. 1331 in Florenz] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Apresso si schriuerra gli huomini di Fucecchio, che furono sindachim}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 quando preuileggiati si racomadorono ad la signoria di Firen\u231 \'e7e a di 5 di nouenbre mcccxxxi. Maestro Giouanni Ghualcherini, Ser Chello di Pardo, Ser Puaino\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Ce\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, Ser Vanni di Forte, Guiduccio Raducci et \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (Se?)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 rosino Celli. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Et l\rquote anno 1356 dono il chomune di Fucecchio per vtilitadegli abitanti di decto luogo rispecto alla peruersita delle septe il sangue alla signoria di Firen\u231 \'e7e. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 L\rquote anno 1356 il comune di Fucecchio dono alla signoria di Firen\u231 \'e7e la giuriditione del potere\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 il rectore per giustitia f\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 sangue\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Text teils stark ausgewaschen, daher vollst\u228 \'e4ndig zitiert. F\u252 \'fcr Literatur zur Gemeinde Fucecchio vgl. Alberto \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Malvolti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, La comunit\u224 \'e0 di Fucecchio nel Medioevo, Bd. 1, Vicopisano 2014 (Studi fucecchiesi 1), online: https://www.academia.edu/9364480/La_comunit%C3%A0_di_Fucecchio_nel_Medioevo._Il_castello_labbazia_il_comune_secoli_XI-XIV_ (letzter Zugriff: 11.08.2016).}
Mori maestro Agostino Romano generale degli Agostini
Nel 1369 et di 9 di gennaio il comune di Firençe prese San Miniato al Tedesco
Apresso si schriverra gli huomini di Fucecchio che furono sindachim

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 211\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -213\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Gespr\u228 \'e4ch der 12 Meister der Theologie zu Paris \u252 \'fcber das gr\u246 \'f6\u223 \'dfte Gottesgeschenk}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Expositione di XII maestri in teologia] \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ne tempi passati in Parigi si trouarono dodici maestri in teologia}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, et parlando didio singhularmente disputauano, quale fusse il piu excellente dono, che iddio dia in questa vita ad i suoi amici, et choncludendo dissono in questo modo: Primo maestro disse che il piu exellente dono\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Quarta et ultima che noi non pensiamo ad i nostri pechati et come grauemente abbiamo offeso ad l\rquote altissimo iddio, al quale sia gloria per infinita secula seculorum. Amen. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition und Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung ermittelt. Text steht wohl in Beziehung mit den im deutschsprachigen Raum h\u228 \'e4ufiger vorkommenden \u8222 \'84Spr\u252 \'fcchen der zw\u246 \'f6lf Meister zu Paris\ldblquote , vgl. Volker Honemann, \u8218 \'82Spr\u252 \'fcche der 12 Meister zu Paris\lquote , in: VL\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 2\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Bd. 9, coll. 201-205. Allerdings keine \u220 \'dcbereinstimmung im Text. Die \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 dodici maestri in teologia \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 lassen auch an die Anekdote denken, nach der {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Dante Alighieri}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 nach der Publikation der \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Commedia \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 von den Franziskanern der H\u228 \'e4resie angeklagt wurde und \u252 \'fcber Nacht u. a. das Credo schrieb, wor\u252 \'fcber der Inquisitor mit den \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 dodici maestri in teologia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 beriet, vgl. Giosu\u232 \'e8 \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Carducci\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Delle rime e della varia fortuna di Dante, Bologna 1913, S. 217-218. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Rest von fol. 213\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 leer.}
Ne tempi passati in Parigi si trovarono dodici maestri in teologia

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 214\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 2 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Briefe}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 von 1458 vor dem Ausbruch des Konflikts um die Vorherrschaft in Genua \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 1458 unterwarf sich der {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Doge Pie(t)ro Fregoso von Genua}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Johannes II. von Anjou, Herzog von Kalabrien}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, so dass Genua unter dessen Herrschaft als \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 governatore \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 fiel, protegiert von seinem Onkel {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Karl VII. von Frankreich}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Noch 1458 floh Fregoso, unzufrieden trotz Abfindung, nach Mailand zu {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[3].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Francesco Sforza}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 und plante einen Umsturz, um wieder an die Macht zu gelangen. Nach seiner R\u252 \'fcckkehr nach Genua 1459 wurde er jedoch ermordet. Vgl. dazu \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Sergio \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buonadonna\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 /Mario \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Marcenaro\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20, Rosso doge. I dogi della Repubblica di Genova dal 1339 al 1797, Genua 2007, S. 45; Steven A. \plain \f1\i\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Epstein\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20, Genoa and the Genoese. 958-1528, Chapel Hill 1996. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (214\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 Brief des {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Pie(t)ro II Fregoso}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24, Doge von Genua, an seinen Kanzler (Genua, 10. Mai 1458) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Copia della lectera che schrisse al suo chancelliere a Milano messer Piero di messer Batista da Chanpo Fregoso, dogo di Genoua\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.<{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 }}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 C<ome per altra aurete inteso ieri, consignai castellecto}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 allo inlustrissimo signore ducha di Calabria ad nome della maesta del re di Francia, cosi me a facto la confessione. Ello non a questi di non fidandosi di mi prima che io gli consignasse castellecto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 a noui me retrouaro con uoi. Racomandateme a quello illustrissimo duca\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (= Francesco Sforza) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et alla inlustrissima duchessa. Data Janue die x maij 1458\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 P. Nouaxic\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [iu?]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 s\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?). \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (214\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 Brief {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Johannes\rquote II. von Anjou}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 (Genua, 23. Mai 1458) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 N}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 obilis vir am}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 [...]}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 noster carissime, hauemo riceuuta uostra lettera per l}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 [a qu]}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 ale}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 noi aduisate della sonma contente\u231 \'e7a ha quella uostra excelsa signoria de nostri progressi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 l\rquote affectione uostra uerso noi continuo perseuerare. Valete. Janue xxiii maij 1458. Johannes dux Calabrie et Lotheringie etc. pro sacratissima regia maiestate Francorum, Janue locumtenes\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. A. Peganus\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition oder Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung ermittelt. Bei dem Brief Pietro II Fregosos handelt es sich um eine Mitteilung an seinen Kanzler in Mailand, in der er die Bedingungen darlegt, unter denen er Johannes II. von Anjou die Stadt Genua am Tag zuvor \u252 \'fcbergeben hat. Bei dem Brief Johannes\lquote II. von Anjou handelt es sich um ein Dankschreiben f\u252 \'fcr die Gl\u252 \'fcckw\u252 \'fcnsche, die ihm die Signoria in Florenz f\u252 \'fcr seine Erfolge in Genua \u252 \'fcberbrachte.}
Come per altra aurete inteso ieri consignai castellecto
Nobilis vir am[...] noster carissime havemo ricevuta vostra lettera per la quale

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset163 Times New Roman (Vietnamese);}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 215\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Auszug aus der Legende zu Katharina von Siena}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 P}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ortarono gli angioli morta che fu santa Chaterina insul monte Sinay}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et quiui la seppelirono. Della quale sepultura esce uno liquore prefectissimo. \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 E\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 bbe {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 santa Chaterina}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 da Yddio sei grandissime gratie. \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 P\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Rima che iddio la uisito nella prigione. Siconda che iddio la fe pascere da gli angioli suoi nella charcere giorni dodici\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Sesta che Yhesu Christo exaudi i suoi diuoti prieghi, il perche ella exaudira qualunque persona la preghera diuotamente. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Edition (Abdruck nach Florenz, BNC, XXXV 173): Collezione di leggende inedite, scritte nel buon secolo della lingua toscana, Francesco \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Zambrini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 /Giovanni \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Bastia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (edd.), Bologna 1855, S. 141-152 (Text vgl. S. 151-152). Nachdruck in Le pi\u249 \'f9 belle leggende cristiane tratte da codici e da antiche stampe, Guido \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Battelli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Mailand 1928, S. 330-338. Nicht identisch mit der bekannten Legende {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Raimunds von Capua}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20.}

... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et salta sen\u231 \'e7a istare inp\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (220\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Nachtrag: Cicero, Pro Marcello 3] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Tulio nella commendatione che fe ad Cesare, quando ristitui Marcho Marcello in Roma: {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[8].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Puossi uedere certamente come gran loda sia nel beneficio dato}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, quando nel riceuuto e tanta gloria\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Die italienische \u220 \'dcbersetzung der Seneca-Briefe stimmt weitgehend \u252 \'fcberein mit Anonymus, Volgarizzamento delle pistole di Seneca e del trattato della provvidenza di Dio, Brescia 1822. Diese \u220 \'dcbersetzung wird auf 1308-1325 datiert und stammt dialektal aus Florenz. Vgl. dazu und zur Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung Marco \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Baglio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, \u171 \'abParla secondo l\rquote oppinione de\lquote pagini\u187 \'bb: Chiose trecentesche al Seneca in volgare, in: Italia medioevale e umanistica (51) 2010, S. 31-99; Cristiano \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Lorenzi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, online: http://tlion.sns.it/divo/index.php?op=fetch&type=opera&id=937&lang=it (letzter Zugriff: 15.08.2016).}
Perche adunque i nostri figlivoli admaestriamo ne‘ liberali studii
Niuno puo avere cio che vuole ma egli puo bene
Io chredo che il primo argomento di choraggio bene ordinato
Quale cosa e piu vituperosa et piu riprensibile che
La cosa che nascondere no si puo
Maggiore vergogna e di manifestare il peccahato che non e di farlo
Il puledro si come disse Virgilio esce del buono armento
Puossi vedere certamente come gran loda sia nel beneficio dato

\f1\i\lang1033\fs24 comincia ad auere potentia in noi, esso solo fa la uia ad gli altri. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (221\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [15, 8] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 In decto libro adpare nella siconda chonlactio\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [ne]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 dello ab\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [at]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 e Nes\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [te]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 rete\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (=Nesterotis) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et al septimo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (korrekt: octavo)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 capito\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [lo] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 at\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 27I\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [I fraglich, eventuell Korrektur].< >{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 P}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Er certo maggiore miracolo e ad i sue gliere il uitio}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 della lossuria dalla propia charne\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 e di piu graue et di piu dannosa chaduta. Finis\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition einer mittelalterlichen \u220 \'dcbersetzung vorhanden. Edition des lateinischen Texts: CSEL, Bd. 13; PL, Bd. 49, col. 477-1328. Filippo \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Argelati\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Biblioteca degli volgarizzatori, Bd. 2, Mailand 1767, S. 147, erw\u228 \'e4hnt dreimal eine \u220 \'dcbersetzung der Collationes: zweimal mit anonymem \u220 \'dcbersetzer, darunter auch die Codices in der Biblioteca Riccardiana, sowie einmal einen Codex (unter Verweis auf Biblioteca degli Scrittori Milanesi, Bd. 1, S. 513), bei dem {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Luca Crivelli}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 aus dem Jesuitenorden als Autor der \u220 \'dcbersetzung gilt.}
Disse decto abbate Cerimone che tre cose sono quelle
Ma perche niuno vitio e contento di segnoreggiare esso solo
Per certo maggiore miracolo e ad i sue gliere il vitio

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 222\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Brief}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Johannes\lquote II. von Anjou}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 an die {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Signoria von Florenz}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 (14. Sept. 1459) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Coppia d\rquote una lectera che da Genoua il ducha di Chalauria schrisse a la signoria di Firen\u231 \'e7e riceuuta ad xvij de settenbre 1459\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 M}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 <}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Agnifici prestanteque}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 (!)}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 viri amici nostri carissimi}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, perche ne rendemo certi che d\rquote ogni nostra felicita et exaltatione vi rallegrate non meno che della nostra propia \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 che anora che la cosa e recente non se ne fa lo conto, perche ue gaudium ue n\rquote auisiamo. Data Ianue xiiij\plain \f1\i\super\lang1033\fs24 o\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 settenbribus 1459 circha ora nona etc. Ioannis dux Calabrie etc. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Extra. Magnificis et prestantibus viris dominis prioribus Flor\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [ren]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [e?]. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition und Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung ermittelt. Der Brief wurde direkt nach dem siegreich niedergeschlagenen Umsturzversuch {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Pietro Fregosos}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 am 13. Sept. 1459 geschrieben. Darin ein Bericht zum Tod Fregosos: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Auemo per mano del magnifico Giouanni Coscia nostro capitano preso il decto messer Piero ferito a morte, il quale di poi poco interuallo expirauit\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Zur Geschichte und zu{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Johannes von Lothringen}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 s. o. Text auf fol.\plain \f1\lang1033\fs16 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 214\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20.}
Magnifici prestanteque viri amici nostri carissimi

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;\red224\green224\blue224;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 222\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -228\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 I Reali di Francia}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, Exzerpt \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (222\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Qui apresso si schriuerra il principio de\rquote Reali di Francia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 F\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Erramonte \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (= Faramund) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 de discendenti di Priamo fu il primo re di Francia. Et seguito\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 C\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Louis \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (= {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Chlodwig I.}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 regno re di Francia anni xxx. Il quale fu magnifico et potente signore et fu il primo re di Francia Christiano\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et el qual Pipino nacque il re Charlo Magno\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (222\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Pipino}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, (223\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Desidero\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!), (223\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Carlo Magno}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, (223\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Firen\u231 \'e7e, Attila re de\rquote Vandali\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, (223\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Mori la la contessa Mactelda\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... (227\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[3].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Benedecto XI.}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, (228\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[4].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Clemente V.}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (228\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 I\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 L primo martedi di febraio 1248 fu rocto chon tucta la sua conpagnia Federigo}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 inperadore dal popolo di Parma\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di poi essendo rocto Federigo, si fuggi et andonne in Cremona\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 M\u246 \'f6glicherweise Rezeption von Andrea \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 da Barberino\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, I reali di Francia, G. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Vandelli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 /G. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Gambarin\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Bologna 1947. Jedoch keine direkte Abh\u228 \'e4ngigkeit durch gleichen Wortlaut erkennbar. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Zwischen den K\u246 \'f6nigen und P\u228 \'e4psten immer wieder mit Florenz in Verbindung stehende Ereignisse erw\u228 \'e4hnt, z. B. auf fol. 227\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 : >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 C\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 ominciossi a bactere moneta d\rquote oro in Firen\u231 \'e7e del mese di nouenbre 1252 di fine oro et octo fiorini pesauano una oncia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20.}
Il primo martedi di febraio 1248 fu rocto chon tucta la sua conpagnia Federigo

Jan. 1460) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Copia d\rquote una lectera che il duca di Calauria schrisse a Firen\u231 \'e7e ad Antonello Scaglione suo secretario\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 M\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Agnifice regie perenne\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 consiliari et fidelis nostri\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (?) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 carissimi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Ne dii}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 passati per nobile nostro Antonio dalla Torre decto Lobrauo, mandato}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di la per alchune faccende nostre\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ad la inlustra signoria di Venetia, che sara con questa uedroti mandate p\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [e]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 r bo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ch\rquote ann\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Data in \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [castro ciuitat]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 is Thea\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [ni die] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 xx\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [ianuarii] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 mcccclx\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Dux Calabrie et Lothoring. etx. principe regni Sicilie, locumtenens et vicarius generalis. Stepfani Notarius. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Adresse] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 At ergo: Magnifico\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 spectoque\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 uiris Checcho d\rquote Caluse, Antonello Scaliono consiliaris\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et commissario\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!)\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 nostris carissimi \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!). \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine Edition oder Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung. Inhaltlich geht es um verb\u252 \'fcndete St\u228 \'e4dte und K\u246 \'f6nige aus dem K\u246 \'f6nigreich Neapel (u. a. L\rquote Aquila, San Germano, Contessa di Celano, Gaitano signore di Sermoneta, Deisebo di l\rquote Anguillara), m\u246 \'f6glicherweise f\u252 \'fcr den Kampf um Genua, in den Johannes II. verwickelt war (s. o. Text auf foll. 214\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20).}

Dort keine solches Ereignis f\u252 \'fcr das Jahr 1396 genannt (vgl. S. 203-213), jedoch tauchen mehrere der oben aufgef\u252 \'fchrten Namen dort in anderen Zusammenh\u228 \'e4ngen auf.}

\plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Branchalione Marrusso}}\plain \f1\b\i\lang1033\fs24 , figliuolo del Bastardo dalla Torre\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Kein identischer Wortlaut mit einer zeitgen\u246 \'f6ssischen Chronik. Zum Hintergrund des Krieges, in dem Florenz und Venedig auf der einen gegen Mailand (mit seinem Herzog {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Filippo Maria Visconti}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20) und Genua auf der anderen Seite k\u228 \'e4mpften, vgl. Giuseppe \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Gullino\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Le frontiere navali, in: Storia di Venezia. Dalle origini alla caduta della serenissima, Bd. 4: Il Rinascimento. Politica e cultura, A. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Tenenti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 /U. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Tucci\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Rom 1996, S. 40-44. Zur Schlacht von Rapallo vgl. Guido \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Cappellini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Contributo storico alle relazioni fra Venezia e Genova. Lo scontro di Rapallo (27 agosto 1431), in: Nuovo Archivio Veneto (n. s. 6, 1) 1903, S. 69-131.}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg0\uc1\deff0\deflang0\deflangfe0{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset1 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green255\blue0;\red255\green0\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue128;\red0\green128\blue128;\red0\green128\blue0;\red128\green0\blue128;\red128\green0\blue0;\red128\green128\blue0;\red128\green128\blue128;\red192\green192\blue192;\red204\green238\blue221;} \uc1 \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 232\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -233\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[0].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Spr\u252 \'fcche von 10 Philosophen am Grab Alexanders des Gro\u223 \'dfen}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (232\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Einleitung] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Il uersificatore disse d\rquote Alessandro Magno\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 >}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 O}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 < }}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 allegre\u231 \'e7e mondane, quanto siete friole et uane et quanto e fuggitiuo l\rquote onore}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, o uanagloria uana et fallace! Ecco {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 Alessandro}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 fa essenplo al mondo. Che essendo uiuo non gli bastaua il mond, ora si nobile corpo in picciola terra giace et sobgiunsono al quanto filosafi, che i primi furono tre, che vennono ad la sipoltura che quasi tucta era d\rquote oro\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (232\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -233\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) [Spr\u252 \'fcche der 10 Philosophen] >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 P\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 rimo filosafo disse: Alessandro che era re et \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [po]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ssedeua loro \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 e egli posseduto da lor\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [o]. >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 S\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 icondo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [filosafo disse: ...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ua tucto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 contento di fossa \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 pudi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 T\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 er\u231 \'e7o filosafo disse: Costui il quale ieri seguitauano tucti i uiui, ora egli seguita tucti i morti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 D\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ecimo filosafo disse: Ieri ogni gente era soctoposta ad Alessandro et ora egli e meno che quali degli altri\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Acht Spr\u252 \'fcche entstammen dem {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[1].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Viridarium principum}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 des 1411 gestorbenen {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat17 Andreas de Pace}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs20 (OM)\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Edition des lateinischen Texts mit moderner italienischer \u220 \'dcbersetzung: Andreas \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 de Pace\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (O. Min.), Viridarium principum. Il giardino dei principi, Diego \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Ciccarelli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Palermo 2003. Vgl. dort S. 158-161. Nach der Edition beginnt der Abschnitt, in dem die Spr\u252 \'fcche der Philosphen am Grab Alexanders stehen, mit einem Verweis auf den Traktat \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 De providentia\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 eines gewissen Alphonsus (konnte nicht identifiziert werden).}
Sprüche & Philosophen & Grab & Alexander der Große
O allegrece mondane quanto siete friole et vane et quanto e fuggitivo l’onore

>}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 M}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 [}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 di}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 ]}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 ssimo adfar}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 [}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 e}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat17 ?]}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et di nobile ingegno, non si perde per altra cosa che \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [per] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ebrieta, per l\rquote amore di Cleopatra\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 auea sete di bere sangue humano. Questa fu cosa da non sofferire, pero che egli il faceua, quando egli era ebbro. Ancora era questa piu graue cosa che la ebrieta, per che crudelta seguita uolontieri ebri\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [e]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ta. Finis. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Text stimmt nur z. T. \u252 \'fcberein mit Anonymus, Volgarizzamento delle pistole di Seneca e del trattato della provvidenza di Dio, Brescia 1822, S. 510. Zur \u220 \'dcbersetzung, Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung und Literatur s. o. Text auf foll. 215\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 -220\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Nachtrag: ep. 6, 4] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Et si l\rquote uomo la sapien\u231 \'e7a mi desse per cotale conditione, che io la douessi tenere rachiusa, et non la douessi mostrare ad altrui, certo io la rifiutere\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Text stimmt \u252 \'fcberein mit Volgarizzamento della IV. V. VI. VII pistola di Seneca. Testo di lingua inedito, Emanuele \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Cicogna\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Venedig 1822, S. 29. Zur \u220 \'dcbersetzung, Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung und Literatur s. o. Text auf foll. 215\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 -220\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20.}

{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[0].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Seneca <philosophus>}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24, {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[1].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Epistulae morales}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, Spr\u252 \'fcche \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [Seneca, ep. 79,11] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Senecha nella pistola ... pero che essere migliore de\rquote piu maluagi non e uirtu. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Seneca, ep. 79, 14?] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[0].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Et a gran pena Socrate monto in buona nominan\u231 \'e7a}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Seneca, ep. 79, 14] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[1].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Toma dispregio Catone insino che egli non fu conosciuto}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, et no \lquote l conobbe insino a tanto che ella il perde\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [Seneca, ep. 123, 16] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[2].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 La pouerta non e rea a niuno}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, se non ad colui che la rifiuta. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Autor?] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Nella\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] ... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 egli gia fu seruo. et \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Autor?] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[3].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Niuna seruitu e si vituperosa come quella di colui}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, che diuiene seruo di sua uolonta\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 [{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[7].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Diogenes Laertios}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 ?] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[4].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Il male huomo teme il mal morire}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, ma il buono huomo teme de mal viuere\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Wohl aus Diogenes Laertios, Vite de\lquote filosofi, Socrates, vgl. Compendio delle vite de filosofi antichi greci et latini et delle sentenze et detti loro notabili tratte da Laertio et da altri gravi autori, Gioachin \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Brugnuolo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Venedig 1598, fol. 14\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Nicht der \u220 \'dcbersetzung von Ps.-Walter Burley entnommen, vgl. Text auf foll. 170\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 -175\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Seneca, ep. 5, 4-6] {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[5].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Nostro proponimento e di uiuere sicondo natura}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, ma questo e contro natura: dare pena al corpo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Et quegli non e minore che usa uasellamento d\rquote argento come se fusser\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (!) \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di terra\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Zur \u220 \'dcbersetzung, Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung und Literatur der Briefe Senecas s. o. Text auf foll. 215\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 -220\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (234\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[1].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Leon Battista Alberti}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24, {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[2].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Deifira}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, Exzerpte \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Tracto da uno autore, che parla dello amore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 L\rquote \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[6].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 amore non si puo con paura mescolare}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et al grande amore niuna cosa e malageuole, niuna osa gli e dura, niuna cosa gli e graue, se non non essere amato. Mai lungo amore fu sen\u231 \'e7a molta copia di sospiri, di lagrime et uarii dolori\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ...\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et godono uinte una et un altra uolta dare quello che piu esse neghano. Et chi non sa, quanto poco si possa, qualunque cosa troppo si desidera\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Fassi parlare la fenmina contro ad l\rquote uomo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [corr. \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 l\rquote uomo contro ad fenmina]\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 ].< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 P\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[7].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 arsegli che una et un\rquote altra, forse piu bella}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 di lei, troppo ad me si proferisse\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et non essere seruo ad chi no te \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [Ed.: sa essere] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 umano signore. Et e ingiusta cosa se dello amore nasce nimista come schade, la quale nasce da poco stabile pecto delle fenmine\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Text erst ab \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Mai lungo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 und bis \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 umano signore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 in dem Werk Deifira von Leon Battista Alberti (1404-1472) nachweisbar, vgl. die Edition: L. B. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Alberti\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Opere Volgari, Bd. 3, Cecil \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Grayson\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Bari 1973, S. 236-239 (Parallel\u252 \'fcberlieferung und textkritischer Apparat auf S. 381-394). Das Werk wird meist um 1430 datiert, vgl. Nicoletta \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Marcelli\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, Due note sulla \u8222 \'84Deifira\ldblquote di L. B. Alberti, in: Interpres (23) 2004, S. 182-199, bes. S. 182-195 (Marcelli selbst glaubt an das Jahr 1428, vgl. S. 195). \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (234\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 Notiz zu {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[2].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Marius}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 und {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[3].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Sulla}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (Volgarizzamento einer antiken Rede?) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Q\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[8].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 uanto Silla ebbe facto morire Mario}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, volle essere facto ditatore in Roma\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 L\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[9].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 A iustitia et i diricti meriti et onesti guiderdoni}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 anno i colli di piu barbere nationi messe socto il giogo di Roma\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 quale egli e tenuto da \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 oli i popoli. E le chonceda l\rquote onore et la grande\u231 \'e7a d\rquote essere dictatore\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (234\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 -235\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[3].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Il conte da Monda}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (Exzerpt aus {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[4].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Giovanni Cavalcanti}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24, {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[3].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Trattato di politica morale}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 ?\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 >[Pel conte] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 d\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [a] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 M\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [o]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 nda\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 P\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <[...] [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Il quale e \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] [s?]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ol\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [o?]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 per \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 on uem\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 no ad i ciptadini di Roma, sono chon tucti i miei beni chaduto \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 La qualcosa dourebbe il contrario, in te Cesare acquistare\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Il conte da Monda parla\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 C\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[10].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 hiarssimamente chi in iudicio me adpella}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, mostra d\rquote auere sete di sangue umane et fame degli altrui beni\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 perdonando ad se ne a suoi alchuna faticha\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 spa\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 na\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 s\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [.]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 st\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 ne. Ne\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 tempo di \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 stra\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 oi\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 si dimostrino\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Contro al conte da Monda\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Q\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[11].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 uando iustitia sia uenerabile et santissima}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 e chontro a tucte, che non vuole che iustitia sobserui\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Eventuell basierend auf Giovanni Cavalcanti (1381- ca. 1451), Trattato di politica morale, vgl. Marcella T. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Grendler\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, The \ldblquote Trattato politico-morale\rdblquote of Giovanni Cavalcanti, S. 167-168. A critical edition and interpretation, Genf 1973. Dort ein Priester namens Conte, der dem {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[8].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 Kardinal Rucellai}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 vor Gericht unterliegt. Ein {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[9].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20\chcbpat18 Conte de Monda}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (wenngleich auf S. 122, n. 4, als m\u246 \'f6glicher Kopierfehler vermerkt) in der Ausgabe von Filippo L. \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Polidori\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Istorie fiorentine scritte da Giovanni Cavalcanti, Bd. 2, Florenz 1839, S. 121-123 (die Stelle bei \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Grendler\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 nicht auffindbar, obwohl nach \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Grendler\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 95-96, Polidori den Text gek\u252 \'fcrzt, nicht verl\u228 \'e4ngert hat). Im Wortlaut unterscheiden sich die Texte von der Handschrift, jedoch geht es in allen Texten um das Thema Gerechtigkeit. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (235\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 Notiz zu Massinissa und Karthago \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Quando si narra, se a Massinissa e da dare Cartagine\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 N\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[12].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 aturale di rictura et ogni iustitia couole}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et domanda che chi e partefice delle brighe\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 morto et arso il paese, la qual cosa fu merito della riservata preda\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Contr\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [o ad] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Massinissa\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 C\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 h\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 m\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 et \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 dati agli strani\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 coltiuatore non\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 gha il sudore de suoi menbri\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Ma sicondo giusta proportione vuole si meritare il conpagno, che il suo comune non inghanni\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 (236\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[5].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Valerius Maximus}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 : Facta et dicta memorabilia 7, 2, ext.5\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, in italienischer \u220 \'dcbersetzung \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Valerio. {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[13].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Fu uno re savui assai, al quale fu portato la corona}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 trouandoti in terra non ti ricorrebbe\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Volgarizzamento nicht identisch mit Valerio \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Massimo\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, De' fatti e detti degni di memoria della citt\u224 \'e0 di Roma e delle stranie genti, Roberto \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 de Visiani\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Bologna 1868, S. 482. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (236\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 Anekdote zu K\u246 \'f6nig {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezper[6].4100/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Darius}} \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Valerio. Lusinghieri\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 D\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[14].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 ario re d\rquote India fe uccidere Dimagoro}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 da The\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [ba?]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24, perche il uolle cominciare a lusinghare\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Keine entsprechende Stelle bei Valerius Maximus ermittelt. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (236\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[4].6922/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Bibelzitat}}\plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24 : Sir, 7,3 \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Eclesiastico\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< [...] \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 s\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 n\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 [...]. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Stelle durch L\u246 \'f6cher im Papier nicht mehr lesbar (heute mit angesetztem Papier gef\u252 \'fcllt). Nach \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Buchholz\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, S. 359: \u8222 \'84Eclesiastico, Kap. 7 v. 3\ldblquote (= Sir 7,3). In neuitalienischer \u220 \'dcbersetzung: \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs20 Figlio, non seminare nei solchi dell'ingiustizia per non raccoglierne sette volte tanto\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20. Inhaltlich ([Un-]Gerechtigkeit) schlie\u223 \'dft die Stelle an die vorherigen Texte an. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 (236\plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs24 r-v\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) {\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://bezwrk[5].6930/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\b\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 Dottrina dello schiavo di Bari}}\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24, Strophen (nach \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs24 Babudri\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24) 21-22, 40-47, 57-58, 69, 75 \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Salomone\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24.< >\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 C\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24 <{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[15].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 om}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[15].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 [e]}}{\field{\*\fldinst HYPERLINK "hida://5650[15].5666v/?u"}{\fldrslt \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24\chcbpat18 uedi fare al tuo uicini, cosi adpara}}\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 / guardati dal giuoco della \u231 \'e7ara, / che chi l\rquote appara et costa \plain \f1\i\strike\lang1033\fs24 amari\plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 chari, / et amano a chi troppo lo costuma / et fa follia. / Se ai figliuolo po niuna stagione, / vuolsi gastigare mentre e gar\u231 \'e7one / et porlo ad arte\plain \f1\lang1033\fs24... - ... \plain \f1\i\lang1033\fs24 Alle cose che l\rquote uomo s\rquote aue\u231 \'e7a, si mantiene. / Lascia stare il male et fa il bene, / et non fare quello, che non si chonuiene, / et non rispondere, se non ti adpartiene. Finis. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 \plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 Andere Ansetzungen des Titels: Serventesi/Proverbi dello schiavo di Bari; Ammaestramenti dati per Salomone. Strophen teils nur fragmentarisch. \par \pard\fi0\li0\qj\ri0\sb0\sa0\itap0 Edition: Francesco \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Babudri\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20, La figura del rimatore barese Schiavo nell\rquote ambiente sociale e letterario duecentesco di Puglia e d\rquote Italia, Bari 1954, S. 167-180 (); Dottrina dello schiavo di Bari. Secondo la lezione di tre antichi testi a penna, Francesco \plain \f1\scaps\lang1033\fs20 Zambrini\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 (ed.), Bologna \plain \f1\super\lang1033\fs20 3\plain \f1\lang1033\fs20 1865. Trattato di politica morale & Il conte da Monda
Et a gran pena Socrate monto in buona nominanca
Toma dispregio Catone insino che egli non fu conosciuto
La poverta non e rea a niuno
Niuna servitu e si vituperosa come quella di colui
Il male huomo teme il mal morire
Nostro proponimento e di vivere sicondo natura
L’amore non si puo con paura mescolare
Parsegli che una et un’ altra forse piu bella
Quanto Silla ebbe facto morire Mario
La iustitia et i diricti meriti et onesti guiderdoni
Chiarssimamente chi in iudicio me adpella
Quando iustitia sia venerabile et santissima
Naturale di rictura et ogni iustitia covole
Fu uno re savui assai al quale fu portato la corona
Dario re d’India fe uccidere Dimagoro
Come vedi fare al tuo vicini cosi adpara
Bologna, Bibl. dei Canonici regolari lateranensi dell'abbazia di S. Salvatore
